The Toronto Raptors ( 11 - 6 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 4 - 14 ) 122 - 95 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 33 - 26 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 55 percent from the field and 68 percent from three - point range , while holding the Sixers to just 42 percent shooting from the floor and 41 percent from long range . The Sixers were led by Robert Covington , who finished with 20 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 6 - 9 3Pt ) , five rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 32 minutes . Jahlil Okafor added 15 points and five rebounds in 25 minutes , while Ersan Ilyasova chipped in 11 points , six rebounds and three assists , in 23 minutes . Sergio Rodriguez was the only other starter to score in double figures for the 76ers , as he finished with 11 points and seven assists , along with three rebounds , in 28 minutes . The 76ers have now lost four of their last five games , while the Raptors have now won four straight . Kyle Lowry led the way for the Raptors , with 24 points , eight assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 31 minutes . DeMar DeRozan struggled shooting , going just 4 - for - 13 on his way to 14 points , but still finished with five rebounds and five assists , while Jonas Valanciunas added 12 points , 11 rebounds and two blocks , in 22 minutes . Terrence Ross chipping in 22 points off the bench , while Cory Joseph added eight points and four rebounds . The only played 24 minutes , as the Raptors had to play this game without DeMarre Carroll and Cory Joseph , who were both out with injuries . Up next , the Raptors will look to keep rolling on Friday in a home matchup against the New York Knicks , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Meanwhile , the Sixers will head home to take on the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 6 - 0 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 5 ) 102 - 101 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Cavaliers were able to hold off the Sixers in this one , as they out - scored them 34 - 21 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , as he finished with 25 points ( 9 - 23 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , 14 assists , eight rebounds and two steals , in 36 minutes . Kevin Love added 20 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) and 11 rebounds , in 38 minutes , while J.R. Smith chipped in 11 points ( 3 - 7 FG ) , three steals and one assist , in 32 minutes . Kyrie Irving struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 17 from the field , but still finished with eight points , in 34 minutes . Tristan Thompson added seven points and 13 rebounds , while the only other Cavalier to score in double figures was Channing Frye , who finished with 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) in 18 minutes off the bench . Joel Embiid was the high - point man for the Sixers , with 22 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) . He also added six rebounds , two assists , four blocks and one steal , in 25 minutes . Dario Saric struggled shooting , going 1 - for 5 from the floor , but finished with three points and seven rebounds . Sergio Rodriguez had a nice all - around game , with seven points , six rebounds and 11 assists , in 31 minutes . The Sixers were led by Jahlil Okafor , who went 8 - for 13 points and 4 - for 6 - 6 from the three - point line , in 28 minutes . Gerald Henderson finished with 11 points and Gerald Covington had four points ( 1 - 10 FG ) in 30 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . The 76ers will look to get their first win of the season when they host the Bucks on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 56 - 26 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 38 - 44 ) 117 - 91 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 31 - 20 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by James Harden , who recorded a triple - double with 16 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 10 assists , in 27 minutes . Terrence Jones added 15 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) , three assists and two rebounds , in 20 minutes . Dwight Howard chipped in 14 points and eight rebounds , while Eric Gordon added 14 points of his own , in 23 minutes off the bench . Trevor Ariza struggled shooting , going 2 - for - 8 from the field and 1 - 5 from the three - point line to score six points , while also adding three rebounds and three assists . Jason Terry started at point guard and finished with nine points , two rebounds and two assists in 22 minutes . As a team , the Rockets shot very well , going 54 percent from the floor and 43 percent from beyond the arc , while the Jazz went just 38 percent ( 19 - 38 FG , 19 - 56 FT ) . The Jazz were without Derrick Favors ( knee ) and Joe Johnson ( ankle ) for the second straight game , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to keep up with the Rockets . Rodney Hood was the only starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG ) , two assists , two steals and one block , in 21 minutes . Rudy Gobert had a quiet night , finishing with just eight points and nine rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 24 minutes . Trey Burke was the lone bright spot for the Jazz , who shot a paltry 38 percent from both the field ( 8 - 29 FG ) and three - pointers ( 2 - 19 3Pts ) . Alec Burks led the team in scoring with 14 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 2 2Pt ) , in 25 minutes . Next up , the Jazz will head to Dallas to take on Friday to play the Mavericks , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Houston , on the other hand , will look to keep their playoff hopes alive as they play host to the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The Washington Wizards ( 46 - 28 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 21 - 53 ) 119 - 108 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 27 - 27 in the first quarter and 37 - 13 in the second quarter . The Lakers were able to make a run in the third quarter , but were n't able to hold off the Wizards in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 37 - 37 in the final 12 minutes . John Wall led the Wizards with 34 points ( 14 - 25 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , 14 assists and four steals in 37 minutes . Bradley Beal added 16 points ( 7 - 16 FG ) and three assists , while Otto Porter , Jr. chipped in 16 points of his own . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double with seven points and 11 rebounds , while Nene Hilario added 10 points ( 3 - 4 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) and five rebounds in 18 minutes off the bench . D'Angelo Russell led the Lakers in scoring with 28 points ( 10 - 21 FG ) , to go along with nine assists and six rebounds , in 40 minutes . Jordan Clarkson was the only other starter to score in double figures , as he finished with 22 points , while Jordan Clarkson added 22 points . Julius Randle struggled shooting , going 2 - for - 7 from the field and 0 - for 1 from the three - point line , to finish with six points , six rebounds and five assists , in 32 minutes . Nick Young and Jordan Clarkson 's replacement , Ivica Zubac , finished with 10 points each . Lou Williams had 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) in 27 minutes , while Lou Williams added 10 ( 5 - 6 FG ) . Next up , the Wizards will head home to take on the Phoenix Suns on Friday , while the Lakers will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 5 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 4 - 8 ) 124 - 105 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 34 - 40 in the first quarter and never looking back . They were led by Russell Westbrook , who recorded a triple - double with 30 points ( 13 - 21 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 13 assists , in 34 minutes . Victor Oladipo followed up with 26 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , six assists and five rebounds , in 36 minutes . Steven Adams finished with 15 points and seven rebounds , while Enes Kanter chipped in 13 points and three rebounds in 13 minutes off the bench . With the win , the Thunder improved to 5 - 2 at home and are now 3 - 2 in their last six games . The Nets were led in scoring by Brook Lopez , who finished with 22 points ( 8- 16 FG , 4- 7 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds , along with two assists , four steals and two blocked shots , in 28 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic added 13 points in 24 minutes , while Rondae Hollis-Jefferson finished with 13 points , five rebounds and two steals , in 27 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Nets was Sean Kilpatrick , who added 10 points in 21 minutes . Up next , the Nets will head home to take on the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Thunder will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 18 - 5 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 10 - 13 ) 108 - 96 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 31 - 31 in the first quarter and 33 - 17 in the second quarter . The Nuggets were able to make a run in the third quarter , but the Rockets were able not to let up and out - scored the Nuggets 28 - 23 in the fourth quarter to seal the win . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Rockets recording 20 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Nuggets committed 15 turnovers to just 24 assists . Donatas Motiejunas was the high - point man for the Rockets , with 25 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and one assist , in 32 minutes . James Harden finished with a double - double , with 24 points and 10 rebounds , in 38 minutes . Dwight Howard added 26 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 8 - 17 FT ) and 13 rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 30 minutes . Trevor Ariza chipped in 13 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 3 - 11 3PT ) , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 42 minutes , while Patrick Beverley finished with nine points , two rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 35 minutes . Ty Lawson led the way for the Nuggets , with 19 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) , 12 assists , four rebounds and four steals , while J.J. Hickson added 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) . Will Barton was the only other Nugget to reach double figures , as he finished with 20 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 24 minutes off the bench . Next up , the Nuggets will head home to take on the Golden State Warriors on Friday , in what will be the second game of their current four - game road trip . Meanwhile , the Rockets will look to keep their winning streak alive , as they play host to the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Jazz were led by Trey Lyles , who finished with 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) and 11 rebounds , along with three assists and five steals , in 39 minutes . Gordon Hayward followed up with 17 points ( 6 - 16 FG ) , two rebounds and three assists , in 32 minutes , while Shelvin Mack added 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 4 3PT and 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds , in 35 minutes . Jeff Withey finished with 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG ) and nine rebounds , while Trey Burke chipped in 12 points and four assists in 21 minutes off the bench . Julius Randle finished with two points ( 1 - 4 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) with nine rebounds and one assist , in 33 minutes . Next up , the Lakers play the second game of a back - to - back against the Golden State Warriors on Friday , in which they 'll look to extend their winning streak to five games . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 32 - 20 in the first quarter and never looking back . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Knicks never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Knicks were held to 42 percent shooting from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , while the Pacers shot 53 percent from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc . Hibbert added 10 rebounds and one block to his team - high 18 points , while Stucky added five rebounds and three assists to his 22 points . He finished with seven points , five assists and six rebounds in 36 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will head home to take on the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while Indiana will travel to Toronto to play the Raptors on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 44 - 30 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 39 - 35 ) 112 - 95 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Hawks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , Atlanta led for the entirety of the second and third quarters , as they held the Pistons to just 15 points in the first and third quarter , while scoring 27 of their own . The key for Atlanta was their shooting , as the Hawks went 45 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Pistons finished at 39 percent and just 24 percent from deep . Paul Millsap was the player of the game , as he led the Hawks with 23 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , nine rebounds , five assists , four steals and four blocks in 29 minutes . Jeff Teague finished with 12 points and 12 assists , while Al Horford added 13 points , five rebounds and five assists of his own . Kent Bazemore finished with 17 points and four rebounds in 33 minutes . The Pistons were led by Tobias Harris and Andre Drummond . Harris finished with 21 points and 10 rebounds , while Drummond finished with 19 points and 17 rebounds in 31 minutes . Drummond also had two blocked shots , giving him his second double - double of the season . The only other Piston to reach double figures was Jon Leuer , who chipped in 15 points and seven rebounds in 17 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Hawks will look to keep their playoff hopes alive in the second half of a back - to - to back as they play host to the Heat on Friday , while Detroit will head home to take on Friday to play the Nets .

The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 23 - 19 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 24 points , 6 rebounds and 7 assists . This marks the second straight loss for the Magic , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . Up next , the Spurs will head home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Magic will head to Miami to play the Heat on Friday .

The Boston Celtics ( 5 - 4 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 4 - 6 ) 105 - 99 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Celtics came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the entirety of the second half , as they held the Pacers to just 14 points in the third quarter and outscored them 31 - 23 in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Celtics recording 22 assists to just 13 turnovers , while the Pacers committed 13 turnovers to just 17 assists . Isaiah Thomas led the Celtics in scoring , as he tallied 23 points and five assists in the win . Kelly Olynyk was the only other Celtic in double figures , totaling 16 points , six rebounds and four assists . Amir Johnson and Avery Bradley each scored 14 points each , with Bradley adding eight rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block to his tally . Jae Crowder came off the bench to provide 12 points and three rebounds in just 16 minutes of action . The Pacers were led by Jeff Teague and Myles Turner , who each finished with 20 points and 17 points , respectively . Teague also dished out four assists and grabbed three rebounds . Monta Ellis finished with 15 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal , one block and one three - pointer . Thaddeus Young and C.J . Miles each scored 10 points apiece , with Young adding eight points , three rebounds and two blocks , and Miles adding three rebounds , two blocks and one steal . The only other Pacer to reach double figures in points was Al Jefferson , who chipped in 10 points in 17 minutes . Next up for the Pacers is a matchup with the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Meanwhile , the Celtics are off until Saturday , when they host the Toronto Raptors for their next game . This was the second game of a back - to back for the Celtics and they 'll look to extend their win streak to three . The Pelicans won the first two games of their current three - game road trip by a combined 29 points .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Utah Jazz , 99 - 90 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 16 - 27 ) have now won three straight games , all of which have come on the road . Boston has now won five of its last six games , as they continue to battle for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the Eastern Conference playoff race . They 've also won four of their last five games by at least 10 points , and they 've now won their last four games by a combined total of 54 points . Wednesday 's win came on the back of a 19 - point , five - assist performance from Kelly Olynyk off the bench . He 's now averaging 19 points , 5 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals on the season . Jared Sullinger was the only other Boston player to score in double figures , as he finished with 12 points and nine rebounds in 27 minutes . Avery Bradley added 12 points of his own , while Marcus Smart chipped in 14 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and one assist in 29 minutes . Gordon Hayward led the way for the Jazz with 26 points , six rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks on 7 - of - 17 shooting . Enes Kanter added 20 points and six rebounds in 31 minutes . Derrick Favors finished with 13 points , eight rebounds , four assists , one steal and four blocks in 34 minutes , while Trey Burke added 18 points and four three - pointers in 32 minutes as a reserve . The Jazz shot just 43 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . Up next , the Celtics will head to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Portland to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 16 - 30 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 15 - 32 ) 106 - 99 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 24 - 22 in the first quarter , but the Magic battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth . However , the Pacers were able to out - score the Magic 31 - 17 in the fourth quarter to seal the win . The Magic were led by Nikola Vucevic , who had a game - high of 27 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and seven steals . He 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Victor Oladipo was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , finishing with 18 points ( 8 - 17 3PT , 1 - 4 3PT ) , while also adding three assists and two rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line a whopping 25 times , converting on 15 of those attempts . Elfrid Payton had a solid game as well , finishing the night with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3PT and 1 - 5 FG ) , eight assists and three rebounds . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Aaron Gordon , who finished with nine points ( 3 - 5 2PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds . For the Pacers , David West led the way , scoring 20 points and grabbing four rebounds in 34 minutes . It was his second straight game with 20 points , as he 's combined with Roy Hibbert and Rodney Stuckey to lead the team in scoring . The other than West , the other three starters scored in double digits for the Pacers . C.J . Monta Ellis came off the bench and finished with 17 points ( 7 - 15 FG ) and six rebounds in 20 minutes , while George Hill chipped in 18 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal in 29 minutes off the pine as well . With Paul George Hill sitting this one out with an ankle injury , it was up to the bench players to carry the load , as the starting five combined to score 52 of the team 's 106 points . With the loss , the Magic fall to 15 - 31 - 30 on the season . They 'll look to bounce back when they take on the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Pacers will look to continue their winning ways when they host the New York Knicks on Friday .

The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 30 - 17 in the first quarter and 36 - 25 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Kings were n't able to keep up with the fast paced Warriors offense . The Los Angeles Clippers ( 52 - 28 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 41 - 39 ) 98 - 91 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 23 - 21 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Mavericks never led by more than seven points in the second half . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Clippers recording 25 assists to 10 turnovers , while the Mavericks committed 14 turnovers to just 18 assists . The Mavericks were led by Deron Williams , who scored a team - high of 21 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and five assists , in 31 minutes off the bench . Dirk Nowitzki was the only other Maverick to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 14 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and five rebounds , in 28 minutes . Wesley Matthews struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for 5 from the three - point line to score seven points , while also adding three assists and zero turnovers . The only other player to score in double figures for the Mavericks was Devin Harris , who finished with 11 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 6 3Pts ) , in 13 minutes . J.J. Barea was the high - point guard for the Clippers , with 22 points , along with two assists and one rebound , in 26 minutes . Blake Griffin finished with 17 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists and two steals , in 33 minutes , while DeAndre Jordan added 14 points and 10 rebounds , while JJ Reddick chipped in 20 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 3PT ) and one assist , in 30 minutes . Chris Paul struggled with his shot , going only 2 - of 10 from the floor , but still finished with five points , seven rebounds and 11 assists , as well as one steal , in 35 minutes . The Mavs are currently in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They 're home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The New York Knicks ( 7 - 7 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 8 - 8 ) 107 - 103 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . Kristaps Porzingis led the way for the Knicks with a game - high 31 points ( 13 - 23 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , one assist and one block , in 40 minutes . Derrick Rose followed up with 18 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 28 minutes , while Carmelo Anthony chipped in 17 points , six rebounds and one steal , in 36 minutes . The Knicks shot 47 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , while the Trail Blazers shot 44 percent from deep and 27 percent from long range . The Trail Blazers were led by Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum , who finished with 22 and 16 points , respectively , in 35 minutes . Ed Davis finished with 14 points and 10 rebounds , in 33 minutes . Maurice Harkless added 15 points and eight rebounds , while Evan Turner added 11 points and two assists , in 24 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Knicks will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . The Blazers , on the other hand , will stay home and go up against the Heat on Friday .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 23 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 13 - 22 ) 88 - 87 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Lakers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pacers 28 - 15 in the first quarter , but the Pacers battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth . However , the Lakers were able to out - score the Pacers 25 - 18 in the final quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . Kobe Bryant led the Lakers in scoring with 20 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds , six assists and three steals , in 32 minutes . He 's now averaging 24 points , 7 rebounds and 6 assists on the year . Nick Young was the only other Lakers player to score in double figures , as he finished with 22 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 12 - 12 FT ) and three rebounds , in 29 minutes off the bench . Ed Davis had 11 points and six rebounds as well , while Jordan Hill had four points ( 1 - 7 FG ) , five rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal , in 23 minutes . For the Pacers , Roy Hibbert recorded a double - double with 12 points and 11 rebounds , while Donald Sloan added 16 points and nine assists , in 36 minutes . Rodney Stuckey finished with 10 points , four rebounds and four assists , while David West chipped in 11 points , eight rebounds and three assists . The Pacers shot just 37 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the arc , as they were out - rebounded 50 - 37 . Up next , the Pacers will head home to take on the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while the Lakers will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double with 11 points and 14 rebounds , along with three steals , one assist , one block and one steal , in 35 minutes , while Derrick Favors added 12 points and five rebounds in 25 minutes . The Cavaliers struggled shooting the ball , going 37 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the arc . LeBron James led the way for Cleveland , with 29 points , six rebounds , five assists , four steals and four steals , while Kyrie Irving added 20 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 39 minutes . Tristan Thompson finished with 12 points , 12 rebounds and one blocked shot , in 34 minutes . The Wizards ( 14 - 16 ) came into Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , and they did n't disappoint . Bradley Beal followed up with 22 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 37 minutes , while John Wall chipped in 18 points , 16 assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block , in 42 minutes . The Bucks were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo 's 22 points and 13 rebounds , while Tony Snell added 20 points and four rebounds , in 29 minutes . Jabari Parker was the only other starter in double figures , with 14 points , six rebounds and four assists , in 40 minutes . Matthew Dellavedova struggled with his shot , going 1 - of 9 from the field , but finished with eight points and 11 assists , along with two steals and two blocked shots , in 30 minutes . Khris Middleton added 16 points off the bench , in 22 minutes . Milwaukee shot 46 percent from the floor and 30 percent from three - point range , while Washington shot 51 percent and 41 percent from long range , as a team . Up next , the Bucks will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday , while the Wizards will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 6 - 3 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 8 ) 119 - 103 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Raptors were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after trailing by double - digits for the majority of the game . They outscored the Sixers 33 - 20 in the final 12 minutes to seal the victory . Toronto shot 48 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range , while holding the Sixers to 46 percent shooting from the floor and 41 percent from long range . Kyle Lowry and Luis Scola led the way for the Raptors . Lowry finished with 23 points and eight assists , while Scola finished with 21 points and five rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double with 11 points and 12 rebounds , while DeMar DeRozan added 14 points and four rebounds . Terrence Ross chipped in 15 points off the bench , while Cory Joseph added 10 points and 10 rebounds . The Sixers were led by Jahlil Okafor , who finished with 26 points ( 13 - 22 FG , 0 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds , four blocks and one assist , in 33 minutes . T.J. McConnell was the only starter to score in double figures , as he finished with two points ( 1 - 5 FG ) and 13 assists , in 31 minutes . Nerlens Noel was the high - point man for the Sixers , with 19 points ( 5 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2FT ) , along with four rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 27 minutes , while Dario Saric added 18 points in 29 minutes . The 76ers will look to get their first win of the season when they host the New York Knicks on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for Philadelphia . Meanwhile , the Raptors will travel to Brooklyn to take on the Nets on Friday .
The New York Knicks ( 14 - 10 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 10 - 16 ) 118 - 112 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Knicks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they outscored the Lakers 34 - 19 in the fourth quarter to pull away and secure the victory . The key for New York was their defense , as they held the Lakers to 48 percent shooting from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . They also forced 14 turnovers from the Lakers , while committing just 14 of their own . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams , who scored 24 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds , five assists and two steals in 26 minutes off the bench . Luol Deng also had a nice game , as he went 8 - for - 13 from the floor to score 22 points , while also grabbing five rebounds . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Julius Randle had a solid game as well , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 34 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line 10 times and converted on 10 - of - 10 attempts . Derrick Rose and Kristaps Porzingis did everything they could to keep the Knicks in this game . Rose finished with 25 points ( 12 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and two assists , while adding three rebounds , two assists and one block . He did have four turnovers though , so it was n't all good news for the Knicks . Porzingus on the other end of the floor though . He finished with 26 points and 13 rebounds , giving him his second double - double in a row . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Courtney Lee , who finished with 16 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) and one assist in 35 minutes . Carmelo Anthony struggled shooting the ball , but still finished with 13 points , seven rebounds and seven assists in 38 minutes of action . He also had two steals and two blocked shots in that time . The bench was led by Lance Thomas Robinson , who had 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , three rebounds and three assists in just 23 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Lakers will stay home and play the Clippers on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 22 - 5 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 9 - 20 ) 113 - 100 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 30 - 26 in the first quarter and 31 - 22 in the second quarter . The Pelicans were n't able to keep up with the Spurs in the third quarter , as they were out - scored 31 - 21 , allowing the Spurs to run away with the game . San Antonio shot 49 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pelicans to 46 percent shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 22 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , six rebounds and three assists , in 26 minutes . He 's now averaging 22 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Kawhi Leonard had 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds , in 24 minutes , while Pau Gasol had seven points ( 3 - 7 FG ) , 14 rebounds , four assists , two blocks and two steals , in 23 minutes . Tony Parker chipped in 12 points , six assists and four rebounds , while Manu Ginobili added 17 points and one rebound , in 18 minutes off the bench . The only other player to score in double digits for the Spurs was Patty Mills , who finished with 11 points ( 2 - 4 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) , along with seven assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 20 minutes . For the Pelicans , Alexis Ajinca led the way with 16 points ( 8 - 12 FG ) and eight rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points and 29 rebounds over those last two games . Anthony Davis struggled with his shot , going 5 - for - 12 from the floor and 2 - for 4 from the free throw line to finish with 12 points . He did n't get much help from anyone else , as the only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Buddy Hield , who scored 14 points (6 - 11 FG ) . The other than that , no other player scored more than 11 points for the Pelicans . The bench was led by Tyreke Evans , who had 12 points ( 4 - 10 ) and six rebounds . The loss snapped a three - game win streak for the Pelican , who 've now lost four of their last five games . Up next , the Spurs will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Pelicans will head to Houston to play the Rockets on Friday .

In fact , Memphis held a double - digit lead for the final 40 - plus minutes , as they held the Heat to just 15 points in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Grizzlies recording 25 assists to just eight turnovers , while Miami committed 14 turnovers to just 14 assists . Memphis also dominated the shooting , going 44 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range , while holding Miami to just 44 percent and 38 percent from long range . Dwyane Wade was n't far behind , finishing with 19 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals , in 37 minutes . Goran Dragic finished with 16 points , three rebounds and five assists , while Hassan Whiteside finished with five points , 11 rebounds , one assist and five blocks , in 36 minutes . Jeff Green chipped in 16 points and seven rebounds , while Mike Conley added 16 points of his own , in 38 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for Memphis was Vince Carter , who chipped 12 points off the bench , in 23 minutes .

They were able to hold off a late rally from the Timberwolves , as the Nuggets were up by as many as 12 points in the fourth quarter . The Timberwolves were able , however , to make a run in the last minute of the game , as Andrew Wiggins and Gorgui Dieng tied the game with a pair of free throws to bring it to a one - possession game with just over a minute to go . From there , the Nuggets went on to out - score the Timberwolves 24 - 24 in the final two minutes to seal the win . Kirk Hinrich finished with 17 points and two steals in 34 minutes , while Pau Gasol chipped in 14 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block in 27 minutes . Stephen Curry led all scorers with 27 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 3 - 11 3PT ) , to go along with five rebounds , four assists and four steals in 35 minutes . Harrison Barnes was the only other Warriors player to score in double figures , as he finished with 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) and nine rebounds in 32 minutes . Klay Thompson finished with 15 points , three rebounds and three assists , while Draymond Green had nine points ( 3 - 8 FG ) , eight rebounds and five assists . The only other Warrior to reach double figures was Ian Clark , who chipping in 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) in 29 minutes off the bench . Golden State shot 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while the Bulls shot 40 percent from deep and 32 percent from beyond the arc . Up next , the Warriors will look to extend their winning streak to 10 games , as they play the second game of a back - to - back when they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , while Chicago will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday .

Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with 25 points , six rebounds , five assists , two steals and one blocked shot , in 32 minutes . Jabari Parker added 20 points of his own , while Malcolm Brogdon finished with 11 points and four assists , in 33 minutes . The Bucks shot 54 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while the Timberwolves finished at 56 percent from deep . The Wolves will look to continue their winning ways Friday in Chicago .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Boston Celtics , 100 - 98 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Saturday . The Celtics ( 1 - 3 ) were expected to win this game easily , but the Pacers ( 2 - 2 ) had other ideas . Indiana outscored the Celtics 26 - 16 in the fourth quarter and held them to just nine points in that 12 - minute stretch . The Pacers shot 39 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while the Celtics shot 42 percent and 37 percent , respectively . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Indiana recording 18 assists to 14 turnovers , while Boston committed 20 turnovers to 20 assists . Paul George led the way for the Pacers , as he tallied 26 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jordan Hill finished with 16 points and 10 rebounds . Miles came off the bench to provide 10 points and two rebounds . Isaiah Thomas led the Celtics with 27 points and seven assists . Avery Bradley finished with 21 points and five rebounds . Indiana will be in action again on Tuesday , as they travel to Toronto to take on the Raptors .

Next up , the Mavericks play the second game of a back - to - back in as many nights when they host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , in what will be the second of a four - game road trip . Detroit plays the third game of their current five - game Western Conference road trip , when they visit the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The New York Knicks ( 14 - 10 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 10 - 16 ) 118 - 112 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Knicks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they outscored the Lakers 34 - 19 in the fourth quarter to pull away and secure the victory . The key for New York was their defense , as they held the Lakers to 48 percent shooting from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . They also forced 14 turnovers from the Lakers , while committing just 14 of their own . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams , who scored 24 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds , five assists and two steals in 26 minutes off the bench . Luol Deng also had a nice game , as he went 8 - for - 13 from the floor to score 22 points , while also grabbing five rebounds . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Julius Randle had a solid game as well , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 34 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line 10 times and converted on 10 - of - 10 attempts . Derrick Rose and Kristaps Porzingis did everything they could to keep the Knicks in this game . Rose finished with 25 points ( 12 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and two assists , while adding three rebounds , two assists and one block . He did have four turnovers though , so it was n't all good news for the Knicks . Porzingus on the other end of the floor though . He finished with 26 points and 13 rebounds , giving him his second double - double in a row . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Courtney Lee , who finished with 16 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) and one assist in 35 minutes . Carmelo Anthony struggled shooting the ball , but still finished with 13 points , seven rebounds and seven assists in 38 minutes of action . He also had two steals and two blocked shots in that time . The bench was led by Lance Thomas Robinson , who had 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , three rebounds and three assists in just 23 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Lakers will stay home and play the Clippers on Friday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 43 - 31 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 27 - 48 ) 114 - 106 on Monday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 20 - 18 in the first quarter , but the Magic battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth . However , the Thunder were able to out - score the Magic 30 - 20 in the fourth quarter to seal the win . Russell Westbrook led the Thunder in scoring with 57 points ( 21 - 40 FG , 6 - 15 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds and 11 assists , in 42 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line 11 times , converting on nine of those attempts . Victor Oladipo was the only other player to score in double figures for the Thunder , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 17 FG , 1 - 6 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds in 44 minutes . Enes Kanter recorded a double - double off the bench with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 6 FT , 10 rebounds ) and 10 assists in 20 minutes . The Magic were led by Evan Fournier , who finished with 24 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 3 - 8 3PT ) , six rebounds and five assists in 41 minutes . Terrence Ross chipped in 23 points of his own , while Nikola Vucevic recorded an 11 - point ( 3 - 14 FG ) and 16 rebounds in 33 minutes . Aaron Gordon and Elfrid Payton added 13 points each , while D.J . Jeff Green finished with 12 points and 11 rebounds , in his second game back after missing two games with a sprained ankle . With the loss , the Magic are now just a half - game behind the Thunder for the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference playoff picture . They 'll have to wait and see who they 'll be playing in the second half of a back - to - back set , as they travel to Miami to take on the Heat on Wednesday . The Heat , on the other hand , have won four of their last five games and sit in the third seed in the East . They head to Miami for a Wednesday night showdown with the Heat .
The Sacramento Kings ( 10 - 16 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 18 - 10 ) 96 - 92 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Kings got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 24 - 19 in the first quarter , but the Grizzlies battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Kings were able to out - score the Grizzlies 27 - 23 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Kings , finishing with 22 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and one block , in 35 minutes . Garrett Temple added 17 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 3 - 6 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) and six rebounds , while Kosta Koufos chipped in 16 points and 13 rebounds , in 30 minutes . Darren Collison added 11 points and six assists , in 38 minutes , while Ben McLemore finished with eight points and two steals , in 16 minutes . The Grizzlies were led by Marc Gasol , who finished with 20 points ( 6 - 18 FG ) , six rebounds and four assists , along with two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Tony Allen finished second on the team , with 16 points , to go along with nine rebounds , two steals and one blocked shot , in 34 minutes . Zach Randolph was the only other Memphis player to score in double figures , as he finished with 13 points , in 28 minutes off the bench , while Vince Carter added 10 points and nine rebounds in 27 minutes . Mike Conley had eight points ( 2 - 7 - 7 FG , 4 - 5 3PT ) , three rebounds , six assists and two blocks , in 29 minutes . Next , the Grizzlies will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back , while the Kings will head home to play the Pelicans on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 37 - 25 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 36 - 24 ) 114 - 106 on Monday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C . The Raptors were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Wizards 35 - 28 to finish the game . They were led by DeMar DeRozan , who scored a game - high 32 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 9 - 12 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds and five assists , in 38 minutes . He 's now averaging 24 points and 8 rebounds on the season . The Wizards were led in scoring by John Wall , who finished with 30 points ( 9 - 24 FG , 4 - 8 3Pd , 8 - 10 FT ) and eight rebounds , along with seven assists , three blocked shots and one steal , in 37 minutes . Bradley Beal followed up with 27 points , seven rebounds and four assists , while Otto Porter , Jr. added 18 points , eight rebounds and three steals , in 36 minutes . The only other Wizards player to score in double figures was Markieff Morris , who chipped in 11 points and eight boards , in 35 minutes . For the Raptors , Norman Powell was the player of the game , as he scored a team - high 21 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) in 25 minutes off the bench , while adding six rebounds and one assist , in just 25 minutes . Cory Joseph added 15 points and five rebounds , while Serge Ibaka and DeMarre Carroll scored 14 and seven points , respectively , in 33 minutes . Up next , the Raptors will head home Wednesday to take on the Pelicans , while the Wizards will head to New York to play the Knicks on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 34 - 20 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 33 - 22 ) 113 - 98 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 30 - 26 in the first quarter and 32 - 21 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , as they shot 46 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while the Cavaliers shot just 44 percent from beyond the arc and 26 percent from long range . Derrick Rose led the Bulls in scoring with 30 points ( 12 - 24 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and four rebounds , in 41 minutes . Tony Snell added 22 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 4 - 6 3PT ) and three steals , in 38 minutes . Pau Gasol finished with 18 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) and 10 rebounds , along with six assists and one block , in 32 minutes . Joakim Noah recorded a double - double with 10 points ( 2 - 6 FG ) and 15 rebounds , as well as eight assists , in 31 minutes , while Rajon Rondo chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 3 - 5 3PT . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who went 12 - 26 from the floor and 2 - 9 from deep to finish with 31 points , five rebounds , four assists and eight turnovers , in 34 minutes . Timofey Mozgov finished with 13 points and 11 rebounds , while Kyrie Irving added 17 points , six rebounds , seven assists , one block and one steal , in 37 minutes . Tristan Thompson added 10 points , eight rebounds and one assist , while J.R. Smith finished with eight points ( 3 - 10 FG ) , four rebounds four assists , three steals and one blocked shot , in 30 minutes . Up next , the Bulls will head home to take on the Pacers on Friday , while Cleveland will head to Milwaukee to play the Bucks on Friday . The Cavs will look to get back on track Friday , when they play host to the Bucks .
The Utah Jazz ( 29 - 36 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 23 - 43 ) 88 - 85 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . Derrick Favors led the way for the Jazz with 26 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 10 - 13 FT ) , to go along with four blocks , two steals and one assist , in 35 minutes . Rudy Gobert had a double - double with 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and 19 rebounds , in 39 minutes , while Gordon Hayward chipped in 12 points , five rebounds and three assists , in 36 minutes . The Jazz shot 48 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range , while the Pistons shot 38 percent from beyond the arc and 35 percent from long range . The Pistons were led by Greg Monroe , who finished with 16 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and 13 rebounds , along with two assists , two blocks and two steals , in 33 minutes . Tobias Harris was the only other Piston to score in double figures , as he finished with 14 points , in 28 minutes off the bench , while Jon Leuer added 11 points ( 2 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) of his own , in 32 minutes . Reggie Jackson was the next highest scorer for the Pistons , with 10 ( 4 - 11 FG ) , while Andre Drummond was held to just four points , two rebounds and two blocks , in 11 minutes . Next up , the Jazz will travel to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while Detroit will stay home and play the Heat on Friday .
The Utah Jazz ( 20 - 13 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 7 - 24 ) 100 - 83 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after trailing by double - digits for the majority of the game , as they outscored the Sixers 30 - 9 in the final period to secure the victory . The Sixers were led by Ersan Ilyasova , who finished with 16 points and 12 rebounds in 24 minutes . He 's now averaging 15 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Jahlil Okafor had 13 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) , four rebounds and two assists , while Nik Stauskas had nine points ( 3 - 9 FG ) , five rebounds , three assists and three steals in 34 minutes . Robert Covington had a rough night shooting the ball , going 0 - for - 11 from the field to finish with one point , seven rebounds and three assists in 32 minutes . The 76ers will look to bounce back when they take on the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Jazz will host the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . The win snapped a three - game losing streak for the Jazz , as George Hill led the way with 21 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) , eight rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block in 29 minutes . Gordon Hayward added 20 points of his own , while Rodney Hood chipped in 20 points as well . Rudy Gobert finished with nine points and 13 rebounds in 33 minutes , while Derrick Favors had four points ( 1 - 7 - 7 FG , 3 - 11 FT ) but added 12 rebounds , one assist and one blocked shot in 25 minutes . Favors also had one of his best games of the season , as he recorded four points , 12 rebounds and one assist in just 25 minutes of playing time . Utah shot 48 percent from the floor and 58 percent from three - point range , while holding the 76ers to 40 percent shooting and 25 percent from beyond the arc . They 'll look to build off this win when they host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday for their next game .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 32 - 22 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 39 - 12 ) 89 - 74 on Wednesday at FedExForum in Memphis . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Spurs 17 - 14 in the first quarter and 29 - 20 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the Spurs to just 37 percent shooting from the field and 21 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 50 - 44 and out - assisting them 50 to 44 . Marc Gasol was the high - point man for the Grizzlies , with 15 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds , one assist and one block , in 34 minutes . Zach Randolph chipped in 15 points and six rebounds , in 23 minutes off the bench , while Mike Conley added 12 points and nine assists , in 35 minutes . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 13 points and 10 rebounds , along with two blocked shots , in 33 minutes . Danny Green finished with 12 points , eight rebounds and two assists , while Manu Ginobili added 14 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and three rebounds in 17 minutes . On deck for San Antonio is a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday . The Grizz are off until Sunday , when they take on the Los Angeles Clippers . This was the Grizzlies ' second game in as many nights , as they 've now won four of their last five . San Antonio 's next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 50 - 9 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 22 - 37 ) 119 - 108 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 32 - 31 in the first quarter and 34 - 24 in the second quarter . The Sixers were able to make a run in the third quarter , but were n't able to hold off the Warriors in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 26 - 28 , allowing the Warriors to pull away and secure the victory . Kevin Durant led all scorers with 27 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 10 - 11 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds , four assists and one block , in 33 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 21 points of his own , while Stephen Curry chipped in 19 points ( 7 - 23 FG , 0 - 11 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) and six assists , in 35 minutes . Draymond Green finished with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and 11 assists , while Zaza Pachulia added 16 points and five rebounds , in 15 minutes . Dario Saric led the way for the Sixers , as he went 6 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - 6 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding seven assists and seven rebounds . Robert Covington finished with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 7 3PT ) , eight rebounds and four steals , in 34 minutes . Gerald Henderson was the only other than Saric to score in double figures , with 16 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 - 5 3PT . Jahlil Okafor finished with four points ( 2 - 3 FG ) , three rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 17 minutes . The 76ers shot 45 percent from the floor and 29 percent from beyond the arc , while the Warriors hit 45 percent of their shots and 21 percent from long range . Next up , the Warriors will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday night , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Meanwhile , the 76ers will look to get out of this slide on Friday , when they play host to the Timberwolves .
The Houston Rockets ( 26 - 25 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 27 - 22 ) 115 - 102 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 31 - 31 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by James Harden , who finished with 26 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , three - 4 FT ) , 14 assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block , in 35 minutes . Josh Smith followed up with 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) and four rebounds in 21 minutes , while Patrick Beverley added 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) , three rebounds and two assists , in 29 minutes . Eric Gordon chipped in 18 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 4 - 7 3PT ) , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 23 minutes off the bench , while Corey Brewer added 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 5 3 Pt ) and two steals , in 33 minutes . Trevor Ariza struggled shooting , going 4 - for 10 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line , to finish with nine points , while also adding four rebounds and three assists . The Heat shot 45 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc , as they were out - rebounded by the Rockets 51 - 34 . Luol Deng led the Heat in scoring , with 17 points , along with eight rebounds , while Amar'e Stoudemire had a double - double with 14 points and 10 rebounds , in 24 minutes . Dwyane Wade added 16 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 0 - 4 3PT , four assists , one steal and one blocked shot , in 28 minutes . Goran Dragic was the only other Miami player to score in double figures , as he finished the game with 14 , to go along with six assists and four points , in 32 minutes . Chris Bosh finished with 13 points , seven rebounds and one assist , in 30 minutes . Next up , the Rockets will head to Dallas to take on the Mavericks on Friday , while the Heat will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday . This was the second game of a back - to back for both teams , as the Rockets and Spurs will be in San Antonio .
The Sacramento Kings ( 9 - 15 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 14 ) 99 - 97 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Kings with 27 points ( 12 - 25 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 37 minutes . Rajon Rondo had a double - double with 16 points and 12 assists , while Omri Casspi had 11 points and eight rebounds in 40 minutes . The Kings were able to hold the Knicks to 40 percent shooting from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , while the Kings shot 45 percent from the floor and 19 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who finished with 23 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 6 - 11 FT ) , 14 rebounds and four assists in 39 minutes . Arron Afflalo had 14 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) and four rebounds in 33 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis had 13 points ( 4 - 11 FG ) , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and three blocks in 34 minutes , while Justin Holiday chipped in 10 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , six rebounds , three steals and two assists in 24 minutes off the bench . Anthony 's 23 points were a season - high for him , as he 's now averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds on the year . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Kristaps Peralis , who had eight points in 18 minutes . With Derrick Rose sitting out with a soreness in his knee , the Knicks were forced to turn to their bench to try and make up for the scoring void left by their starting backcourt , which was led by Lance Thomas and Lance Thomas . Thomas finished with nine points ( 2 - 6 FG , 4 - 4PT ) and three steals , while Thomas added four rebounds and one steal . The loss snapped a three - game win streak for the Knicks , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . Up next , the Kings will look to extend their win streak to five games when they take on the Trail Blazers in Portland on Friday , while New York will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 31 - 14 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 33 ) 99 - 87 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 30 - 15 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . James Harden led the way for the Rockets , scoring a game - high 37 points on 12 - 20 shooting from the field and 4 - 11 from three - point range , to go along with eight rebounds and five assists , in 35 minutes . It was his second 37 - point game in a row , as he 's now averaging 31 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists on the year . The Lakers were unable to keep up with the Rockets in this game , as they shot just 43 percent from the floor and 8 percent from long range , while the Rockets shot 40 percent and 30 percent from beyond the arc . They were also out - rebounded by the Rockets 46 - 46 , which may have been the difference in the game . For the Lakers , it was a forgettable night for the starters , as Jordan Clarkson , Ryan Kelly and Robert Sacre combined for just 11 points on 2 - of - 10 shooting , while Julius Randle led the team with 18 points and 11 rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench . The only other player to score in double figures for the Lakers was Wayne Ellington , who finished with 13 points , in 25 minutes , while Jordan Hill chipped in 10 points and seven rebounds . Up next , the Rockets will head home to take on the Clippers on Friday , while Los Angeles will travel to San Antonio on Friday to play the Spurs , in what will be the second game of a back - to back .

The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 31 - 22 in the first quarter and 41 - 22 the rest of the way . They were able to coast to a comfortable victory , as they shot 62 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while holding the Clippers to just 44 percent shooting from the floor and 43 percent from beyond the arc . Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors , scoring 43 points ( 15 - 23 FG , 9 - 15 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and six assists , in 29 minutes . Draymond Green struggled shooting , going just 1 - for - 4 , but still finished with five points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks , in 26 minutes . Marreese Speights came off the bench to score 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and grab four rebounds , in 19 minutes . The Clippers were led by Blake Griffin , who shot 9 - 14 ( 0 - 1 FG ) , on his way to 20 points , in 23 minutes . J.J. Redick was the only other Clipper to reach double figures , as he finished with 13 points ( 3 - 5 3PT ) , along with one rebound and one steal , in 25 minutes . The San Antonio Spurs ( 16 - 6 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 4 - 20 ) 109 - 95 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 29 - 26 in the first quarter and 38 - 15 in the second quarter . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while the Knicks finished at 49 percent shooting from the floor and 40 percent from long range . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the Knicks in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , while also adding three rebounds , two assists and one steal . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 19 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists per game . The only other player to score in double figures for the Knicks was Tim Hardway , Jr. , who finished with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) , one rebound and one assist in 19 minutes off the bench . Hardaway has now scored 20 or more points in three of his last four games , as he 'll look to continue his hot streak . The other two Knicks to reach double figures in points were Amar'e Stoudemire and Iman Shumpert , who each finished with eight points and six assists , respectively . The Knicks will look to get back on track on Friday when they host the Los Angeles Clippers . Meanwhile , the Spurs were led by Manu Ginobili 's 22 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 3 3PT , 7 - 7 FT ) and four rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 30 minutes . It was a season - high in points for the guard , who 's now averaging 16 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists on the year . Danny Green added 13 points and two assists , in 33 minutes , while Patty Mills chipped in 12 points , three rebounds and four assists in 26 minutes as a reserve as well . San Antonio 's next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while New York will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Friday .

The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 23 - 20 in the first quarter and 29 - 21 in the second quarter , but the Nets battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Bulls were able to out - score the Nets 25 - 21 over the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Jimmy Butler led the way for the Bulls , scoring a game - high 40 points ( 14 - 29 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 11 - 11 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds and four steals , in 38 minutes . Dwyane Wade added 16 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) and four rebounds , in 22 minutes , while Rajon Rondo chipped in five points ( 2 - 8 FG ) , nine rebounds and 12 assists , in 35 minutes . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who went 12 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for 6 from the three - point line to score 33 points , while also adding four assists and three rebounds . Sean Kilpatrick added 18 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 4 - 9 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) of his own , along with six assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic finished with 10 points ( 4 - 11 FG ) and two assists , while Trevor Booker finished with six points ( 3 - 7 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) , 13 rebounds , two assists and one block , in 26 minutes . Up next , the Nets will head home to take on the Pistons on Friday . Butler added four steals and four assists to his team - high scoring total , while Wade added four assists , four rebounds and two steals . Robin Lopez finished with 12 points , five rebounds , one assist and two blocks , in 31 minutes . Taj Gibson was the only other Bull to score in double figures , as he finished with eight points and three boards , in 29 minutes . Chicago will look to build off this win when they host the Pacers on Friday , in their next scheduled game .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 1 - 8 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 4 - 4 ) 112 - 106 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 35 - 27 in the first quarter , but the Bucks battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Pelicans were able to out - score the Bucks 27 - 25 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 30 points ( 11 - 24 FG , 8 - 8 FT ) , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and four blocks , in 41 minutes . E'Twaun Moore added 20 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , three assists and two rebounds , in 32 minutes . Tim Frazier chipped in 15 points ( 3 - 8 FG ) , 10 assists , five rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes , while Terrence Jones added 10 points ( 2 - 6 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) and seven rebounds . Jabari Parker was the high - point man for the Bucks , with 33 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , along with nine rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 35 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo finished with 17 points ( 7 - 16 FG ) and 10 rebounds , while Matthew Dellavedova added seven points and 12 assists , in 29 minutes . The Bucks shot 44 percent from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc , but were out - rebounded by the Pelicans 47 - 47 to 47 . Next up , the Bucks play the second game of a back - to - back in as many nights , when they host the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday . New Orleans , meanwhile , plays the second half of a home - and - home set against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday , in what will be their final game of the season .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 98 - 95 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Friday . The Pistons ( 2 - 3 ) have been dominant at home this season , and Friday 's win over the Bucks was no exception . Detroit shot 49 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range , while holding Milwaukee to 47 percent shooting and 25 percent from long range . The Bucks were also out - rebounded , 40 - 35 , and out - scored in the paint , 52 - 36 . The game was tight throughout , as neither team led by more than 12 points . The key for Detroit was the rebounding , as they snatched down 40 boards to Milwaukee 's 35 . The second quarter was when the Pistons really turned it on , out - scoring the Bucks , 27 - 21 . Detroit was led by Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who scored a game - high 19 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Brandon Jennings was second on the team , scoring 15 points and dishing out six assists . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 10 rebounds . Greg Monroe was the only other Piston in double figures , amassing 10 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Brandon Knight led the way for Milwaukee , as he tallied 17 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Jabari Parker finished with 18 points , five rebounds , one assist and three steals . The only other player to score in double digits for Milwaukee was Ersan Ilyasova , who totaled eight points and three rebounds . Up next , the Pistons will stay at home to take on the Nets on Sunday , while the Bucks will head home to play the Heat on Saturday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 20 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 2 ) 89 - 72 in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Philips Arena to take a 2 - 1 lead in the series . The Celtics were expected to win this game easily , but the Hawks had other ideas . Atlanta outscored the Celtics 28 - 18 in the fourth quarter to seal the deal . The Hawks shot 39 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while holding the Celtics to 32 percent shooting and 18 percent from beyond the arc . Al Horford led the Hawks in scoring with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , five blocks and two assists , in 31 minutes . Kyle Korver added 17 points and seven rebounds , while Jeff Teague chipped in 13 points , six assists , one rebound , two steals and one block , in 27 minutes . Paul Millsap struggled shooting , going 1 - for - 12 from the floor , but still finished with four points , seven rebounds and four blocks , in 34 minutes . Dennis Schroder added 12 points and six rebounds , in 21 minutes off the bench . Isaiah Thomas led the Celtics in scoring , with 16 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 1 - 6 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) and three rebounds , along with two assists and one blocked shot , in 30 minutes . Amir Johnson finished with 14 points and eight rebounds , as the only other player to score in double figures for Boston . Marcus Smart was held to just three points , three assists , two rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 29 minutes . Jae Crowder finished with only two points ( 1 - 9 FG , 0 - 4 0Pt ) , but did dish out four assists , four steals , four rebounds and two blocked shots , in 35 minutes . Jared Sullinger started in place of Avery Bradley , who sat this one out with a sore knee . Jared Dudley Moore was the only bench player to play well , as he finished with 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) , five rebounds and three assists in 33 minutes . Game 3 will take place in Atlanta on Monday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 22 - 28 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 23 - 26 ) 115 - 98 on Monday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 28 - 23 in the first quarter and 29 - 18 in the second quarter . The Blazers were able to coast to the victory , shooting 45 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while holding the Hornets to 40 percent shooting from the floor and a paltry 36 percent figure from beyond the arc . Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum led the way for the Trail Blazers , scoring 27 and 18 points , respectively . Lillard added four rebounds and four assists , while McCollup added four assists and three steals . Meyers Leonard was huge off the bench , scoring 21 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and grabbing five rebounds in 29 minutes . Mason Plumlee was the only other Blazer to reach double figures in points , recording seven points and 11 rebounds in 23 minutes . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who scored 22 points ( 8 - 18 FG ) , to go along with five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Nicolas Batum added 18 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) and eight rebounds , while Marvin Williams chipped in 10 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 1 - 7 3PT ) and six rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for Charlotte was Frank Kaminsky Varejao , who finished with 10 points in 25 minutes . Smith added 25 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 6 - 11 3PT ) , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 34 minutes , while LeBron James chipped in 21 points , 13 assists , eight rebounds and three steals , in 36 minutes . The Cavs shot 59 percent from the field and 51 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot 48 percent from behind the arc and 47 percent from long range . Victor Oladipo was the high - point man for the Magic , with 25 ( 8 - 21 FG ) , along with seven assists , one rebound and two steals , while Tobias Harris added 24 points and eight rebounds , in 46 minutes . Nikola Vucevic finished with 22 points and 15 rebounds , while Elfrid Payton added 13 points , 10 assists , nine rebounds and nine turnovers , in 38 minutes . Dewayne Dedmon added three points , five rebounds and one steal , in 18 minutes . Evan Fournier came off the bench and finished with 15 points , in 16 minutes . Next up , the Magic play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the Toronto Raptors on Friday . Meanwhile , the Cavaliers host the New York Knicks on Friday , in what will be the second of a home - and - home set .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 50 - 27 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 46 - 31 ) 99 - 94 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 27 - 23 in the first quarter , but the Bulls battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Cavaliers were able to hold the lead for the rest of the way , as they out - scored the Bulls 20 - 20 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Bulls were led by Mike Dunleavy , who finished with 24 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and four assists in 33 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 24 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists . Aaron Brooks was the only other Bull to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) , six assists and five rebounds in 38 minutes . Jimmy Butler struggled shooting , going 6 - 14 from the field and 2 - 3 from the three - point line , but still finished with 16 points , four rebounds , five assists and three steals in 42 minutes . Pau Gasol finished with 12 points and nine rebounds , while Nikola Mirotic chipped in 12 points of his own in 24 minutes off the bench . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Cavaliers , scoring a game - high 27 points on 8 - 19 shooting , including 4 - 5 from deep and 7 - 8 from the free throw line . He also added five rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block in 37 minutes . J.R. Smith was the other Cavalier to reach the 20 - point mark , scoring 24 points in 43 minutes . LeBron James recorded a double - double with 20 points and 12 assists , while also adding 10 rebounds , two steals and three blocks in 36 minutes . Kevin Love and Timofey Mozgov each finished with 11 points , eight rebounds and three assists , respectively . The Cavs ' next game will be on the road against the Indiana Pacers on Friday , while the Bulls will be at home against the Orlando Magic on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 46 - 32 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 33 - 45 ) 92 - 74 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 20 - 15 in the first quarter and never looking back . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Hornets never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who finished with 15 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and three assists in 31 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 assists on the season . The only other starter to score in double figures for the Hornets was Gerald Henderson , who chipped in nine points in 28 minutes . Bismack Biyombo played 30 minutes and finished with six points ( 2 - 4 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds in 30 minutes . The loss puts the Hornets in a tie for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference with the Miami Heat , but the Raptors are still in the top half of the conference standings . They 're now just a half game behind the Boston Celtics for that final spot . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors , finishing with 18 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) with seven assists and three blocked shots in 34 minutes . Greivis Vasquez was the other starter in the starting lineup . He went 6 - 13 from the field and 4 - 6 from the three - point line to finish with 16 points , five rebounds and four assists in 36 minutes . Tyler Hansbrough recorded a double - double with 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and 12 rebounds in 37 minutes . It was his second double - digit scoring game in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 15 rebounds over his last two outings . Terrence Ross had nine points ( 3 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , two assists and two steals in 23 minutes . Cory Joseph was the only bench player to score more than eight points ( 11 ) , while adding seven rebounds and one assist . The win moves the Raptors up to fifth place in the East , and they 're currently tied with the Indiana Pacers for the third seed in the conference . They head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Hornets are in fourth place and have now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Charlotte 's next game will be on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 114 - 102 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Friday . The Thunder ( 29 - 22 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left with a much needed win . In fact , Oklahoma City led by 20 after the first quarter and never relinquished the lead after that . The key for the Thunder was their defense , as they held the Grizzlies to 48 percent shooting from the field and 16 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Thunder recording 21 assists to just 20 turnovers , while the Grizzlies committed 21 turnovers to just 21 assists . The Grizzlies ( 30 - 20 ) have now lost four of their last five games , as this was easily their worst loss of the season . Marc Gasol carried the load , as he tallied 31 points , four rebounds , eight assists , two steals and one block . Mike Conley finished second on the team , accruing 18 points , one rebound , two assists and three steals . Zach Randolph was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Chandler Parsons was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . On deck for the Grizzlies is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday . For the Thunder , it was a big night on the offensive side of the ball . Russell Westbrook recorded yet another triple - double , accumulating 38 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists in the win . Enes Kanter was second among starters in scoring , dropping 16 points and eight rebounds on 6 - of - 7 shooting . Steven Adams recorded a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double of his own . The bench was huge for Oklahoma City , as all five of them scored at least nine points . Oklahoma City will look to build off this win on Sunday against the New Orleans Pelicans on the road .

Michael Carter-Williams added 19 points ( 9 - 21 FG ) nine assists , four rebounds and two steals , while Khris Middleton finished with 18 points , seven assists and three rebounds . Greg Monroe added 15 points and 14 rebounds in 39 minutes , in 39 points off the Milwaukee bench . Milwaukee shot 42 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point , but they were out - rebounded 50 - 50 - to - 50 , and committed 12 turnovers , compared to the Bulls ' 25 . Next up , the Bulls will head home Friday to take on the Pistons , while the Bucks will travel to Detroit on Friday to play the Pistons .
