This marks the Spurs ' fifth win in six games , and they 'll look to keep it rolling as they play host to the Nuggets in their next game .

The Spurs shot 51 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range , while holding the Grizzlies to just 40 percent shooting and 32 percent from beyond the arc . San Antonio has now won four of their last five games , as they continue to battle for the top spot in the Western Conference standings . They 're now just a half game behind the Oklahoma City Thunder for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the West . The Grizzlies , on the other hand , have now lost three straight games , including two in a row to the Spurs . Zach Randolph was the high - point man for Memphis , with 14 , in 21 minutes off the bench . JaMychal Green finished with 12 points , five rebounds and three assists , while Matt Barnes chipped in 11 points and nine rebounds . The only other Memphis player to score in double digits was Vince Carter , who finished with 10 points , in 27 minutes . Tony Allen was limited to just 17 minutes due to foul trouble , as he finished with just four points on 2 - of 8 shooting , in 17 minutes . With the loss , the Grizzlies are now just half a game ahead of the Clippers for the sixth and final playoff spot , while the Spurs hold the tiebreaker over the Grizzlies for the final spot . The two teams will face off again on Sunday , as the Spurs host the Clippers and the Grizzlies host the Kings .

He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 38 times and converted on 16 of those attempts . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Bismack Biyombo , who finished with nine points ( 3 - 6 FG ) , six rebounds and five blocks . Derrick Rose led the Knicks in scoring with 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds . It was a season - high in points for him . Carmelo Anthony finished with 15 points ( 5 - 17 ) , eight rebounds and three assists . Kristaps Porzingis had a quiet game , but still finished with 12 points , four rebounds , two blocked shots , one assist , one steal and one block . The bench was led by Lance Thomas , who scored 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and grabbed 16 rebounds in just 24 minutes . Thomas has been a huge spark off the bench for the Knicks this season , averaging 17 points and 7 rebounds over his last five games . Justin Holiday chipped in 15 points as well below his season average , while going 7 - for 11 points in 21 minutes . Joakim Noah had six points ( 2 - 5 FG ) and seven rebounds in 22 minutes , while Courtney Lee added 10 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks in 29 minutes . Both teams play on Friday , as the Knicks host the Toronto Raptors , while the Magic visit the Philadelphia 76ers .

The Spurs were led by Tim Duncan , who finished with 11 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds , while Tony Parker added 14 points ( 7 - 18 FG ) , two assists and two steals , in 31 minutes . Danny Green finished with 10 points and four rebounds , along with a pair of assists and a block , in 34 minutes . Next up , the Spurs play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday . This marks the Wizards ' second game in as many days , in which they 'll will look to extend their winning streak to four games . They 'll be looking to extend that streak to five games , as the Pelicans are the only other team to beat them this season . The Los Angeles Clippers ( 20 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 0 - 3 ) 118 - 111 in Game 3 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Staples Center to take a 2 - 1 lead in the series . Los Angeles was expected to win this game easily and they did just that . The Clippers outscored the Lakers 32 - 21 in the fourth quarter to seal the win . The key for the Clippers was their defense , as they held the Lakers to 51 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Clippers recording 25 assists to just 14 turnovers , while the Lakers committed 14 turnovers to just 24 assists . Redick accumulated 15 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kobe Bryant led the Lakers in scoring , dropping 21 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Jeremy Lin finished with 17 points , nine assists and four rebounds in 35 minutes of action . The only other player to score in double digits for the Lakers was Jordan Clarkson , as Larry Nance Jrue Holiday chipped in 10 points and six rebounds . Game 4 will take place in Los Angeles on Tuesday .

Russell Westbrook followed up with 26 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 9 - 12 FT ) , nine assists and five rebounds , in 32 minutes . Enes Kanter added 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes off the bench , while Andre Roberson chipped in 12 points . Jusuf Nurkic recorded his first double - double of the season , with 16 points and 14 rebounds , along with two assists , two steals and one block , in 34 minutes . Kenneth Faried finished with 22 points , 10 rebounds and one assist , in 33 minutes , while Ty Lawson added 22 points and nine assists , in 38 minutes . Wilson Chandler finished with 23 points ( 9 - 15 FG ) , while Jameer Nelson Aka Gorski added nine points ( 4 - 10 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) . The Nuggets were out - rebounded by the Thunder 40 - 40 , as they were unable to match up with their size advantage . Up next , the Thunder will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back . Denver , on the other hand , will look to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Kings .
The Orlando Magic defeated the New York Knicks , 100 - 91 - 91 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . The Knicks ( 8 - 8 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest as one of the hottest teams in the Eastern Conference , having won four of their last five games . However , they were outscored by the Magic ( 7 - 7 ) by a margin of just 20 points in the first half , and the Magic were able to pull away in the second half , outscoring the Knicks by a 28 - point margin over the second and third quarters . Carmelo Anthony led the way for the Knicks with 28 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and a steal . Jose Calderon followed up with 23 points , four assists , three rebounds , a steal and a block . Arron Afflalo and Kristaps Porzingis turned in a pair of 10 - point efforts , with the former adding one rebound and one assist and the latter providing nine rebounds , four dimes and three assists . Robin Lopez was the only other Knick to manage double - digit scoring , posting eight points and hauling in 12 boards . The Magic were led by Nikola Vucevic 's 22 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two blocks and one steal . Tobias Harris was next with 17 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and one block . Elfrid Payton posted 12 points , 11 assists , six rebounds and six boards . D.J . Augustin led the bench with 24 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds and two assists . Evan Fournier ( three points , two rebounds ) and Channing Frye ( two points ) underwhelmed , combining for just six points on 1 - of 5 - of - 12 shooting . The bench was led by Jeff Green 's eight points , three boards , one assist , one block , one steal and one three - pointer over 15 minutes . Orlando shot just 40 percent from the field and 31 percent from beyond the arc , but managed to hold the Knicks to 37 percent shooting overall and 33 percent from three - point range . New York heads back home to face off with the Toronto Raptors on Friday night , while Orlando remains home to tangle with the Charlotte Hornets on Friday evening as well .

Next up for the Knicks is a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back . Meanwhile , the Bucks will look to keep their winning streak alive as they play host to the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 14 - 5 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 15 - 4 ) 107 - 101 on Wednesday at FedExForum in Memphis . The Spurs came into this game as a double - digit favorite and did n't disappoint , as they held the Grizzlies to just 14 points in the first half and outscored them 33 - 22 in the second half . San Antonio shot 48 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range , while holding Memphis to just 46 percent shooting from the floor and 42 percent from long range . Tim Duncan recorded a triple - double with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 10 assists , to go along with two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Manu Ginobili led the team in scoring with 17 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 5 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and seven assists , in 28 minutes off the bench . Danny Green was the only other player to score in double figures for the Spurs , as he finished with 16 points and three rebounds , in 26 minutes . The Grizzlies were led by Marc Gasol , who finished with 28 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 10 - 11 FT ) with 12 rebounds and four blocks , in 40 minutes . Mike Conley finished with 23 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 8 - 9 FT ) of his own , along with 10 assists and one steal , in 38 minutes . Zach Randolph finished with 10 points ( 4 - 11 FG ) and eight rebounds , while Vince Carter chipped in 20 points ( 8 - 11 3PT ) , five rebounds , two assists , one block , one steal and one three - pointer , in 33 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Grizzlies will head to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Friday . This marks the Grizzlies ' fourth loss in five games and they 'll look to get back on track Friday against the Pelicans .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 100 - 93 - 93 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Bulls ( 7 - 2 ) came into Wednesday 's contest looking to extend their winning streak to three games , and they did just that with a big road win over the Raptors . Chicago was led by Pau Gasol 's 27 - point , 11 - rebound double - double , which he supplemented with two assists , three blocks , a steal and a steal . Jimmy Butler followed with 21 points , nine rebounds , six assists and a block . Derrick Rose was right behind him with 20 points , four assists and three rebounds . Mike Dunleavy and Nikola Mirotic were next with matching 14 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists and one steal , and the latter supplying seven rebounds , an assist , two blocks and two steals . Doug McDermott led the bench with 10 points , seven boards , one assist , one steal and two blocks . The Raptors were led by Kyle Lowry 's 20 points and eight rebounds , while Terrence Ross and Amir Johnson turned in matching 12 - point tallies . DeMar DeRozan and Jonas Valanciunas supplied matching 10 - point totals , while Cory Joseph led the second unit with 16 points , five boards , five assists , four steals , four blocks and four blocks . Cory Joseph was productive in a reserve role as well , supplying seven points , two rebounds and one assist over 14 minutes . Toronto shot just 39 percent from the field and 32 percent from beyond the arc . Up next , the Bulls will head home Friday to take on the Wizards , while the Raptors will travel to Indiana on Friday to play the Pacers .

The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 26 - 21 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . Paul Pierce followed up with 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and four assists , while Paul Pierce chipped in 18 points of his own , in 28 minutes . The Jazz were led by Gordon Hayward , who went 9 - for - 19 for 26 points , along with four rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Derrick Favors finished with 16 points ( 8 - 18 FG ) , nine boards , one assist and three blocked shots , in 38 minutes , while Rudy Gobert added nine points ( 3 - 5 FG , 3 - 8 FT , 5 - 9 FT ) with 14 rebounds , two blocked shots and one assist , in 34 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the Lakers on Friday , while the Jazz will head to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Friday .

LeBron James led all scorers with 30 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , along with nine rebounds , seven assists and two blocks , in 42 minutes . Timofey Mozgov added 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds , in 29 minutes , while Kevin Love chipped in 13 points , six rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , in 30 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 45 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range , while holding the Celtics to 39 percent shooting and 27 percent from long range . The Celtics were led by Jae Crowder , who scored 22 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 10 - 10 FT ) with seven assists , in 28 minutes off the bench , while Marcus Smart added 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) , one rebound and one assist , in 26 minutes . Evan Turner finished with nine points , 12 rebounds and three assists , while Tyler Zeller added 11 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and six rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the Celtics was Marcus Smart , who finished with 10 points , in 25 minutes . Game 3 will take place at TD Garden on Friday .

Detroit shot 47 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while holding Memphis to just 44 percent shooting from the floor and 56 percent from beyond the arc . He 's now averaging 23 points and 9 assists on the season . Caldwell-Pup added 24 points ( 11 - 16 FG , 10 - 16 3PT ) and one assist in 37 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a 16 - point ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , 16 - rebound double - double , while Anthony Tolliver added 15 points and seven rebounds in 32 minutes . The Grizzlies were led by Jeff Green and Marc Gasol . Green finished with 21 points and five rebounds , while Gasol added 17 points and 11 rebounds in 30 minutes . Zach Randolph finished with 13 points , five rebounds and four assists , while Beno Udrih chipped in nine assists and four rebounds of his own . The only other player to score in double digits for Memphis was Vince Carter , who chipped 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) in 19 minutes off the bench . Up next for the Grizzlies is a matchup against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday . Detroit will look to keep their playoff hopes alive as they play host to the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while the Grizzlies will head to Cleveland to take on the Cavaliers on Saturday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host San Antonio Spurs , 114 - 105 , in Game 3 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at AT & T Center . The Clippers ( 2 - 2 ) were expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run to get there . In fact , Los Angeles outscored San Antonio , 33 - 29 , in the fourth quarter to pull out the win . The key for the Clippers was their shooting , as they went 54 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range , while the Spurs finished at 44 percent and just 24 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Los Angeles recording 24 assists to just nine turnovers , while San Antonio committed 20 turnovers to just eight assists . Chris Paul was the player of the game , as he tallied 34 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . Blake Griffin finished with 20 points , 19 rebounds and seven assists . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling six points , 14 rebounds and four blocks . J.J. Redick was the only other Clipper in double figures , totaling 17 points and three rebounds . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 15 points , two rebounds and three assists . Kawhi Leonard led the Spurs in scoring , dropping 26 points and seven rebounds on 10 - of - 19 shooting . Tim Duncan finished with 22 points and 14 rebounds , while Tony Parker accrued 18 points and two rebounds . Manu Ginobili and Boris Diaw each scored 14 points off the bench as well below their season averages . Game 4 will take place in San Antonio on Monday at the Spurs home court .

Barea had 15 points in 34 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis finished with 12 points and 10 rebounds , while Robin Lopez added 14 points and 13 rebounds , in 31 minutes . Jose Calderon chipped in 14 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 34 minutes . The Lakers were led by Roy Hibbert , who finished with 18 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and 10 boards , in 33 minutes . Kobe Bryant struggled shooting , going 6 - 19 from the field and 2 - 10 from the three - point line , for 18 points , while also adding three assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 32 minutes . Jordan Clarkson finished with 10 points ( 4 - 13 FG ) and two rebounds in 29 minutes , while Julius Randle finished with six points , 11 rebounds and three assists in 30 minutes . D'Angelo Russell struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - 7 from the floor and 0 - for - 1 from beyond the arc , to score six points in 28 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Lakers will head to Boston to play the Celtics on Friday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 10 - 21 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 15 - 16 ) 104 - 90 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 23 - 25 in the first quarter and 35 - 15 in the second quarter . The Hawks were n't able to keep up with the Timberwolves in the third quarter , as they were out - scored 35 - 20 , giving the Timberwolves the advantage they needed to pull away and secure the victory in front of their home crowd . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for the Timberwolves with 22 points ( 8 - 8 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt ) , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 31 minutes . Zach LaVine added 21 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 6 - 9 3PT ) , while Andrew Wiggins chipped in 21 points of his own . Gorgui Dieng finished with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and three steals in 35 minutes . Ricky Rubio struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 4 from the field , but finished with 10 assists , one rebound and one steal in 24 minutes . The Wolves shot 45 percent from the floor and 48 percent from three - point range , while holding the Hawks to 42 percent shooting and 25 percent from long range . Dwight Howard was the high - point man for the Hawks , with 20 points ( 9 - 9 FG ) and 12 rebounds in 21 minutes . Thabo Sefolosha added 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) , five rebounds and four blocked shots , while Dennis Schroder and Paul Millsapapap contributed eight points each . The only other player to score in double figures for Atlanta was Tim Hardaway Jr. , who finished with 12 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) in 17 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Timberwolves will head home to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Hawks will head to Chicago to play the Bulls on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 48 - 32 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 62 ) 114 - 107 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 28 - 26 in the first quarter and 29 - 25 in the second quarter , but the Sixers battled back to make it a one - point game heading into halftime . However , the Bulls were able to out - score the Sixers 33 - 29 in the third quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull away in the fourth quarter and secure the victory . The 76ers were led by Robert Covington , who finished with 22 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 1 - 9 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , five assists and three rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 22 points , 5 assists and 3 rebounds . JaKarr Sampson was the other starter in double figures , finishing with 18 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) , seven rebounds and four assists in 28 minutes . The only other starter to score in double digits for the 76ers was Jason Richardson , who chipped in 19 points , four rebounds and two assists in 25 minutes . Pau Gasol led the way for the Bulls with 24 points and 13 rebounds in 31 minutes . It was his third double - double in a row , a stretch where he has averaged 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . Derrick Rose was n't too far behind Gasol , as he finished with a team - high 22 points and eight assists , while shooting 8 - for - 19 from the field . He also chipping in six rebounds and three steals . Jimmy Butler struggled shooting , going just 3 - for 11 points , but still finished with 15 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals in 36 minutes . Nikola Mirotic came off the bench to score 13 points ( 6 - 7 FG ) and grab five rebounds in 26 minutes . Joakim Noah was limited to just two points ( 1 - 3 FG ) in 30 minutes , but he did grab seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block in that time . Bobby Portis was the only other Bull to reach double figures with 11 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) in 13 minutes . Next up , the Sixers will head home to take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Bulls will head to Milwaukee to play the Bucks on Friday . The Sixers will be right back in action Friday , as they play host to the Bucks .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 34 - 25 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 23 - 37 ) 118 - 110 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 32 - 35 in the first quarter , but the Pelicans battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Thunder were able to out - score the Pelicans 31 - 26 in the final period to seal the win . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with 41 points ( 14 - 29 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 11 - 12 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 11 assists in 37 minutes . He also had nine turnovers , giving him his third double - double of the season . Enes Kanter added 20 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and nine rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench , while Alex Abrines chipped in 13 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) and three rebounds in 35 minutes . Steven Adams finished with 13 points and 10 rebounds in 29 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 38 points ( 15 - 28 FG ) , seven rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins finished with 31 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 15 - 15 FT ) of his own , to go along with 10 rebounds and three assists in 21 minutes . Jrue Holiday was the only other Pelican to score in double figures , as he finished with six points ( 3 - 9 3PT and 0 - 2PT ) , eight assists , three rebounds and two steals in 33 minutes . Up next , the Pelicans will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Thunder will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday . This was the Thunder 's second game in as many nights , as they 'll look to extend their win streak to four . The Spurs won the first two games of a back - to - back set , but lost the third game of a four - game homestand to the Clippers on Tuesday .
The Orlando Magic ( 19 - 30 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 19 ) 114 - 113 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 27 - 15 in the first quarter , but the Raptors battled back to make it a two - point game by halftime . The Raptors were able to make a run in the third quarter though , as they out - scored the Magic 35 - 32 , but were unable to hold off the Magic in the fourth quarter , as Orlando was able to out - score Toronto 32 - 35 in the final 12 minutes to secure the victory . Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic with 25 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 10 rebounds , five assists and four blocks in 33 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 24 points and 10 rebounds . C.J . Watson was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , as he finished with 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and one assist in 34 minutes . DeMar DeRozan added 22 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 10 - 11 FT ) of his own , to go along with seven rebounds and six assists . Up next , the Magic will head home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Raptors will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Phoenix Suns , 110 - 106 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . The Pelicans ( 16 - 15 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left with a much needed win . The key for New Orleans was their defense , as they held the Suns to 48 percent shooting from the field and 43 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 49 - 38 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Pelicans recording 19 assists to just 10 turnovers , while the Suns committed 17 turnovers to just six assists . The Suns ( 18 - 14 ) have now lost four of their last five games , as this marks their fifth loss in their last six games . Goran Dragic led the way for Phoenix , as he tallied 22 points , three rebounds and three assists . Eric Bledsoe finished with 21 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Markieff Morris was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 13 points and two rebounds . Isaiah Thomas led the bench with 17 points and three rebounds . Phoenix will look to play better on Friday , when they host the Oklahoma City Thunder for their next game . New Orleans has now won four of its last five and they 'll look to keep rolling on Friday against the Los Angeles Lakers . Tyreke Evans was the player of the game , accumulating 24 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Jrue Holiday was second on the team , totaling 21 points and six assists , while Anthony Davis finished with 19 points and 18 rebounds . Ryan Anderson Varejao came off the bench to provide 19 points , four rebounds and one assist . Omer Asik finished with 11 points and eight rebounds in 25 minutes , while Terrence Jones chipped in 19 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting off the pine as well as four rebounds in 28 minutes of action . On deck for the Pelicans is a home matchup against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday .

The game was close throughout , as there were 10 ties and 11 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . Golden State shot 48 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while holding the Bucks to 46 percent shooting and 22 percent from long range . Andre Iguodala was the high - point man for the Warriors , with 14 points and ten rebounds , in 26 minutes off the bench . The only other Warrior to score double digits was Shaun Livingston , who chipped - in 14 . The win gives the Warriors a 20 - point lead in the season series over the Bucks , which now stands at 2 - 1 . Next up , the Warriors will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Bucks will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 22 - 20 in the first quarter , but the Grizzlies battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Raptors out - scored the Grizzlies 24 - 21 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who finished with 18 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds on the season . The only other player to score in double digits for Memphis was Vince Carter , who came off the bench and finished with 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and three rebounds in 22 minutes . The loss snapped a three - game win streak for the Grizzlies , who are now just a half game ahead of the Heat for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the Western Conference standings . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors , as he finished with a team - high of 21 points , shooting 6 - 16 from the field and 9 - 10 from the free - throw line . He also added five rebounds and three assists in 36 minutes . Kyle Lowry was n't far behind , scoring 18 points and dishing out seven assists in 40 minutes . Cory Joseph Joseph Young was the only other Raptors player in double figures , scoring 11 points and grabbing eight rebounds in 30 minutes . Despite the loss , the Grizzlies have now won three of their last four games , as they continue to battle for the final playoff spot in the West . They 'll head home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Raptors will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Washington Wizards , 127 - 89 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Cavaliers ( 34 - 22 ) have been dominant at home this season , and Wednesday 's win over the Wizards was no exception . Cleveland shot 51 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range , while holding the Wizards to just 44 percent shooting overall and 6 percent from long range . LeBron James led the way for the Cavs with 28 points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal , while Kyrie Irving followed up with 25 points , seven assists and two rebounds . J.R. Smith was next with 15 points , five boards , three assists , two steals and one block . Channing Frye led the bench with 12 points , four rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks . Tristan Thompson was the only other Cavalier to score in double figures , totaling eight points , three rebounds and five assists in 23 minutes off the bench . John Wall and Nene Hilario paced the Wizards with matching 18 - point efforts , with the former adding nine assists and five rebounds , and the latter providing three rebounds , three blocks and two assists . Marcin Gortat and Otto Porter , Jr. turned in matching eight - point tallies , while Paul Pierce had a modest nine points but hauled in two rebounds and dished out two assists in 28 minutes . Bradley Beal ( seven points ) and Kelly Oubre Jr. ( four points ) were the only Washington players to score more than four points . The Wizards fell to 33 - 22 at home and currently reside in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home again on Friday against the Detroit Pistons .

The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 30 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 0 - 3 ) 101 - 91 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals . The Pistons were expected to win this game easily and they did just that , but it was close throughout . In fact , there were 10 ties and 11 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . The key for Cleveland was their defense , as they held the Pistons to 49 percent shooting from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . The Cavaliers also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle 46 - 32 and out - rebounding the Pistons 46 to 32 . Kyrie Irving was the player of the game , as he tallied 26 points and four assists in the win . LeBron James finished with 20 points , 13 rebounds and seven assists of his own . Kevin Love recorded a double - double , totaling 20 points and 12 rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for Cleveland were Channing Frye and Kyle Korver , who scored 12 points a piece off the bench . Detroit was led by Kentavious Caldwell-Pope and Andre Drummond , who each scored 18 points each . Drummond added seven rebounds and two blocks to his 17 points . Reggie Jackson recorded 13 points , 12 assists , four rebounds and four steals in 39 minutes of action . Marcus Morris and Tobias Harris each scored 16 points each , with the former adding three rebounds and three assists and the latter providing seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Detroit will look to start a new winning streak on Friday when they host the New Orleans Pelicans for Game 4 . Cleveland will be in action again on Friday in Game 5 , where they 'll look to continue their winning ways .
The Golden State Warriors ( 22 - 4 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 8 - 18 ) 113 - 109 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 29 - 35 in the first quarter and 29 - 15 in the second quarter . The Pelicans were able to make a run in the third quarter , but were n't able to hold off the Warriors in the fourth , as they were out - scored 37 - 18 in the final 12 minutes . Stephen Curry and Kevin Durant were the only two players to score in double figures for the Warriors , with Curry scoring 30 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 5 - 9 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and Durant scoring 27 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with three assists and two rebounds , in 37 minutes . Draymond Green recorded a double - double , with 12 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) and 14 rebounds , along with 10 assists , four steals and one block , in 36 minutes , while Klay Thompson finished with 17 points ( 6 - 16 FG ) , three rebounds and three assists , in 35 minutes . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans , with 28 points and eight rebounds , while Jrue Holiday chipped in 10 points , seven rebounds , six assists , five steals and four blocks , in 30 minutes . Tyreke Evans came off the bench to score 20 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 7 - 8 FT , in 28 minutes ) , while adding six rebounds , two steals and two blocked shots , in 27 minutes . The only other Pelicans player to reach double figures in points was E'Twaun Moore , who scored 13 points and grabbed eight rebounds in 29 minutes . Next up , the Warriors will head home to take on the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Pelicans will travel to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 12 - 6 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 11 - 8 ) 120 - 105 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 25 - 28 in the first quarter and 34 - 23 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 55 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while holding the Grizzlies to just 44 percent shooting from the floor and 41 percent from long range . Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan carried the load for the Raptors , scoring 29 and 24 points , respectively . Lowry added eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . DeMarre Carroll was the only other player to score in double figures for Toronto , scoring 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , while also adding one assist and one steal . The bench was led by Terrence Ross , who scored 16 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) to go along with eight rebounds and three assists in 28 minutes . The Grizzlies were led by Andrew Harrison and Marc Gasol , who each scored 21 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 4 - 5 3PT ) and eight rebounds , respectively , in 35 minutes . JaMychal Green added 16 points and five rebounds , while Tony Allen chipped in 12 points and two assists in 29 minutes . Mike Conley was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 19 points and grabbing eight rebounds in 21 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies will head home Friday to take on the Heat , while the Raptors will stay home and play the Heat on Friday . Memphis will look to get back on the right track Friday , when they play host to the Heat .
The Toronto Raptors ( 26 - 15 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 11 - 31 ) 112 - 100 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 29 - 19 in the first quarter and 33 - 16 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Nets were n't able to keep up with the Raptors ' 51 percent shooting from the field and 54 percent from three - point range . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors , scoring a game - high 30 points ( 12 - 25 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , to go along with five assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 34 minutes . Kyle Lowry followed up with 31 points ( 10 - 13 FG , 7 - 9 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) and eight assists , in 40 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas was the only other Raptors player to score in double figures , as he finished with six points ( 3 - 11 FG ) and 12 rebounds , in 27 minutes . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who finished with 29 points ( 13 - 22 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) of his own , along with 10 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 38 minutes . Joe Johnson added 22 points ( 9 - 12 FG ) , five rebounds and seven assists , while Donald Sloan chipped in 13 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , eight rebounds and six assists . Thaddeus Young finished with 11 points , nine rebounds , two assists and one block , in 35 minutes . Next up for the Nets is a matchup with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Raptors will look to build off this win when they take on the Houston Rockets on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 28 - 30 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 24 - 33 ) 114 - 108 on Monday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 23 - 23 in the first quarter . The Hornets were able to make a run in the second quarter , but the Pistons responded with a 30 - 15 run of their own to end the first half . Detroit 's Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the way with a game - high 33 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 7 - 15 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and three assists , in 43 minutes . Tobias Harris came up big off the bench with 25 points ( 9 - 17 FG ) , seven rebounds , four assists and one block , in 37 minutes . Andre Drummond finished with 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and 13 rebounds , in 26 minutes . Marcus Morris chipped in 16 points and eight rebounds , while Jon Leuer added 10 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) and nine rebounds in 41 minutes . Kemba Walker was the high - point man for the Hornets , with 34 points on 11 - 19 shooting , including 3 - 6 from deep , in 42 minutes . Nicolas Batum finished with 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and a block , while Frank Kaminsky added 17 points , two assists , one rebound and one steal , in 39 minutes . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist finished with a double - double of 12 points and 14 rebounds , along with two assists and two steals , in 38 minutes . Marvin Williams added 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and seven boards , in 40 minutes . Next up , the Hornets play the second game of a back - to back , when they host the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday . Detroit plays host to the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday , in what will be the second of a home - and - home set .
The Toronto Raptors ( 5 - 0 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 2 ) 103 - 98 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Game 6 of the Eastern Conference Semifinals to take a 2 - 1 lead in the series . The Raptors came out strong in the first quarter , out - scoring the Thunder 33 - 13 . The Thunder were able to make a run in the second quarter , but the Raptors out - scored them 42 - 17 in the third quarter , giving them the lead for good . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors with 28 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 14 - 15 FT ) , five rebounds , three assists and two steals in 39 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double with 17 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 29 minutes , while DeMarre Carroll chipped in 13 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , seven rebounds and four steals in 37 minutes . Kevin Durant led the Thunder in scoring with 27 points ( 10 - 19 FG ) , along with seven rebounds , four assists , two steals and three blocks in 38 minutes . Russell Westbrook finished with 22 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 3 - 9 3PT ) , 16 assists and five rebounds in 35 minutes . Enes Kanter was the only other player to score in double figures for the Thunder , as he finished with 15 points and six rebounds in 17 minutes off the bench . Serge Ibaka finished with 10 points , six rebounds and three blocked shots in 33 minutes . Up next , the Raptors will head home to take on Friday to play the Nuggets , while the Thunder will stay home and play the Mavericks on Friday . Game 7 .
The Boston Celtics ( 1 - 2 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 2 - 1 ) 111 - 103 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Hawks 37 - 20 in the first quarter and 32 - 22 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Hawks were n't able to keep up with the Celtics in the fourth quarter . The Hawks were led by Jeff Teague , who finished with 23 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , five assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block , in 32 minutes . Kent Bazemore followed up with 20 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 8 3PT ) , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 34 minutes . Kyle Korver finished with 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 5 - 9 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) and two assists , in 29 minutes . Al Horford finished with eight points and 13 rebounds , while Paul Millsap added eight points ( 3 - 9 FG ) and 10 rebounds , in 37 minutes . Isaiah Thomas led the way for the Celtics , with 42 points ( 12 - 24 FG ) , four rebounds and one assist , in 36 minutes . Evan Turner chipped in 17 points and seven assists , while Jonas Jerebko added 11 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . Amir Johnson finished with 15 points , seven rebounds and two blocked shots , in 31 minutes . Marcus Smart was the only other Boston player to score in double figures , with 11 points and five assists in 33 minutes off the bench . Jae Crowder played 33 minutes and finished with four points , eight boards , three assists , three steals and three blocks , in his second game back from a knee injury . Next up , the Celtics play the second game of a back - to - back when they host the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a home - and - home set . Atlanta will look to get back on track when they take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday in their next game .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 7 - 15 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 1 - 22 ) 100 - 91 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 24 - 13 in the first quarter and 30 - 17 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the Sixers to 39 percent shooting from the field and 13 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 43 - 38 . The Sixers were led by Jahlil Okafor , who recorded a double - double with 22 points and 10 rebounds . He also added two assists and two blocks in 31 minutes . Robert Covington was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Sixers , as he finished with six points on 3 - of - 10 shooting in 27 minutes . Tony Wroten started in place of the injured Dario Saric and finished with nine points , four rebounds and two assists in 17 minutes . The 76ers will look to bounce back when they take on the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Nets will host the Charlotte Hornets on Friday . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the 76ers , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . Brook Lopez and Thaddeus Young led the way for the Nets . Lopez finished with seven points and seven rebounds in 19 minutes , while Young finished with 18 points and 11 rebounds in 33 minutes . Quincy Acy led the team with 23 points and six rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench , while Bojan Bogdanovic added 10 points and three assists in 32 minutes . Sean Kilpatrick chipped in 14 points , six assists and four rebounds as well . The only played 27 minutes , as Jarrett Jack started at point guard with Deron Williams ( ankle ) out . Brooklyn 's next game will be on the road against the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday , while Philadelphia will be at home against the New York Knicks on Thursday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 24 - 10 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 17 - 16 ) 109 - 90 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 34 - 22 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Hornets to just 35 percent shooting from the field and 27 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 53 - 34 . Kevin Durant led the way for the Thunder with 29 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 10 - 11 FT ) , 11 rebounds and four blocked shots in 35 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line 11 times , converting on 10 - of - 11 . Russell Westbrook struggled shooting the ball , going 4 - for - 15 from the floor and 1 - for 3 from beyond the arc , but still finished with 16 points , six rebounds and seven assists in 31 minutes . Serge Ibaka was the only other Thunder player in double figures , finishing with 14 points ( 2 - 8 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) and five rebounds . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who scored a game - high 32 points ( 10 - 24 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 11 - 12 FT ) with five assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block in 36 minutes . Jeremy Lin chipped in 15 points ( 5 - 15 FG ) , four assists , one rebound , one steal and one blocked shot , in 34 minutes , while P.J . Hairston added 10 points ( 3 - 6 - 6 FG , 2 - 4 - 4 3 Pt ) , one assist and one steal , in 21 minutes . Cody Zeller had a rough night shooting , going just 2 - for 5 points , but he did grab four rebounds and one assist , in 23 minutes . The only other Hornets player to reach double figures in points was Marco Belinelli , who finished with nine points and four assists in 25 minutes off the bench . With the win , the Thunder improve to 20 - 9 at home , while the Hornets improve to 11 - 17 at home . Next up , the Hornets will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to back for both teams . Meanwhile , Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook will travel to New Orleans to face off with the Pelicans on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 47 - 22 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 9 - 60 ) 111 - 97 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 27 - 23 in the first quarter and 32 - 21 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 51 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while the Sixers finished at 39 percent shooting from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc . Kevin Durant led the Thunder in scoring with 26 points ( 11 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds and six assists , in 34 minutes . Russell Westbrook finished with 20 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) , 15 rebounds and 10 assists of his own , in 32 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points , 8 rebounds and 8 assists on the season . Enes Kanter chipped in 16 points and seven rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench , while Steven Adams finished with 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and 11 rebounds , in 26 minutes . The 76ers were led by the duo of Nerlens Noel and Jahlil Okafor . Noel had 12 points and nine rebounds , along with two assists , two steals and two blocks , in 35 minutes , while Ogafor had 23 points and four rebounds . Hollis Thompson added 16 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) , four rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 29 minutes . Jerami Grant had 15 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 7 - 12 FT , in 33 minutes . Ish Smith started at point guard for the 76ers , and finished with six points ( 3 - 9 FG ) but dished out seven assists , as he did n't have much help from the rest of the starters . The Sixers have now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Up next , the Thunder will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday , while they 'll head home to play the Nets on Friday . Philadelphia will look to end their losing streak against the Nets .

The Wolves ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Kings will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 15 - 11 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 11 - 17 ) 102 - 94 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Blazers 29 - 26 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Trail Blazers never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Trail Blazers were led by C.J . McCollum and Damian Lillard , who each scored a team - high of 27 points and 19 points , respectively . Lillard added 10 assists and three rebounds to his 19 points . Al-Farouq Aminu was the only other Trail Blazer to score in double figures , finishing with 16 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds and one assist in 29 minutes . Evan Fournier and Channing Frye combined for just nine points on 2 - of - 11 shooting from the field , but Nikola Vucevic and Tobias Harris were the only two Magic players to reach double figures in points . Harris finished with 25 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) and 12 rebounds , to go along with three steals , two assists and two blocked shots , in 36 minutes , while Vucic added 25 points and 11 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Elfrid Payton chipped in 19 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , six rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , while Jeff Green added 15 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) and six assists , in 34 minutes off the bench . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 104 - 88 at Palace of Auburn Hills on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 6 - 5 ) have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . Detroit has now won four of their last five games , and they 've been led by Tobias Harris and Aron Baynes . Harris led the way with 22 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting from the field , while Baynes added 20 points and eight rebounds . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 17 points , and Ish Smith chipped in 11 points , six rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block in 30 minutes . Ish Smith 's backcourt partner , Ish Smith , had 11 points and six rebounds of his own , while Jon Leuer had 10 points and four rebounds in 18 minutes off the bench . Andre Roberson and Domantas Sabonis were the only two Thunder players to score in double figures , as Russell Westbrook led the team with 33 points , 15 rebounds and eight assists . Steven Adams was the only other Thunder player to score more than four points , as he finished with four points and 11 rebounds in 29 minutes . The Thunder shot just 38 percent from the floor and 19 percent from beyond the arc , but they were still able to out - rebound the Pistons 51 - 47 . Up next , the Pistons will stay home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Thunder will head home to play the Heat on Friday .

The Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 14 - 11 ) 113 - 111 at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Wednesday . The Knicks were expected to win this game easily , but the Suns had other ideas . They outscored the Knicks 31 - 21 in the fourth quarter and held them to just 16 points in the final 12 minutes . The key for Phoenix was their defense , as they held New York to 39 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . They also forced the Knicks to commit 13 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own . The Suns were led by Eric Bledsoe , who scored a game - high 31 points on 9 - of - 21 shooting , to go along with eight assists , six rebounds , two steals and one block , in 39 minutes . Tyson Chandler recorded a double - double with 13 points and 23 rebounds , in 41 minutes . Marquese Chriss finished with 14 points and 12 rebounds , while P.J . Tucker chipped in 13 points , seven rebounds , one assist , three steals and two blocks , in 40 minutes . Devin Booker struggled shooting , as he went 3 - of 16 on his way to 12 points , in 36 minutes . New York was led by Kristaps Porzingis , who finished with 34 points , eight rebounds , three blocks and three steals , in 42 minutes . Carmelo Anthony struggled with his shot , going 3 of 15 from the floor and 0 of 2 from three point range , to finish with just 13 points . Justin Holiday was the only other Knick in double figures , with 22 points , 14 rebounds and two assists , in 28 minutes off the bench . Up next for the Knicks is a matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday . Phoenix will look to keep rolling on Friday , when they host the Los Angles Lakers .

The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 22 - 22 in the first quarter and 29 - 20 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Celtics were n't able to keep up with the Bulls in the fourth quarter . Jimmy Butler led the way for the Bulls , scoring 29 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and four rebounds , in 40 minutes . He shot 9 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - of - 5 from the three - point line , while also adding seven assists . He 's now pushed his season averages to 22 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Joakim Noah also had a big game off the bench , scoring 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 0 - 2 FT ) and grabbing eight rebounds in 26 minutes . Taj Gibson had 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and eight rebounds , while Robin Lopez chipped in 15 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) , eight rebounds and two blocked shots , in 27 minutes . The Celtics were led by Isaiah Thomas , who shot 8 - 18 from the floor and 4 - 9 from beyond the arc . He finished with 29 points and seven assists , along with three rebounds and seven turnovers , in 34 minutes . It was his second game in a row with at least 20 points , as he 's combined for 54 points and 12 assists . The other than Thomas , the only other than him to reach double figures in points was Gerald Green , who had 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , seven rebounds and four assists , in 32 minutes . Al Horford struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for 10 shots and finishing with seven points and three assists , while Amir Johnson had 10 points and two blocks , in 17 minutes . Jae Crowder and Marcus Smart combined for just nine points , while Marcus Smart had five points ( 1 - 5 FG ) . Up next , the Bulls will head home to take on the Pistons on Friday , while the Celtics will head to Milwaukee to play the Bucks on Friday . The Cs will look to get back on track against the Bucks .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 33 - 27 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 16 - 42 ) 108 - 101 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 28 - 19 in the first quarter , but the Lakers battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Thunder were able to out - score the Lakers 24 - 29 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Oklahoma City shot 41 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range , while the Lakers shot 44 percent from beyond the arc and 36 percent from long range . Jordan Clarkson added 12 points and four assists , while Wayne Ellington finished with 12 points , five rebounds and six assists , in 34 minutes . Harden added 12 assists and five rebounds to his 22 points , while Eric Gordon added two rebounds and one assist . Trevor Ariza had 24 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 6 - 8 3Pt ) , six assists , six rebounds , three steals and one block . Eric Nance Jr. led the bench with 31 points ( 11 - 15 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) , three rebounds and four assists , in 31 minutes . The Thunder were led by Russell Westbrook , who finished with 39 points ( 13 - 24 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 10 - 16 FT ) and 13 assists , along with 11 rebounds , in 39 minutes . Enes Kanter was the only other Thunder player to score more than 15 points , as he finished with 23 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) in 23 minutes off the bench . Victor Oladipo added 15 points and four rebounds , while Taj Gibson chipped in 12 points ( 6 - 7 FG ) . Steven Adams and Steven Adams finished with 11 and 11 points , respectively , in 24 and 17 minutes , respectively . With the win , the Rockets move into a tie for second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They 'll head to Dallas to take on the Mavericks on Friday , while the Thunder head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Utah Jazz ( 4 - 6 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 2 - 8 ) 102 - 100 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 31 - 23 in the first quarter , but the Knicks battled back to make it a one - point game by halftime . The Knicks were able to make a run in the third quarter though , cutting the Jazz 's lead to just three points , but it was too little too late . Gordon Hayward led the Jazz in scoring with 33 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , to go along with six assists and four steals , in 38 minutes . Derrick Favors recorded a double - double with 21 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 5 - 7 FT ) and 12 rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 31 minutes . Trey Burke finished with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , eight assists and one rebound , in 35 minutes , while Alec Burks chipped in nine points , four rebounds and four assists , in 39 minutes . Carmelo Anthony led the way for the Knicks with 46 points ( 16 - 26 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 13 - 16 FT ) . He also had seven rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 37 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for New York was Kyle O'Quinn , who added 13 points , in 29 minutes off the bench , while going 5 - 8 from the field and 2 - 4 from three - point range , in 28 minutes . New York shot 48 percent from the floor and 63 percent from beyond the arc , but could n't get it done from deep , as they went just 8 - for - 28 from three . The loss snapped a three - game win streak for the Jazz , who have now won two straight . Up next , the Knicks will look to get back on track with a win in Toronto on Friday , while the Jazz will head home to take on the Lakers on Friday .

The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 28 - 16 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Hornets to 37 percent shooting from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while also out - rebounding them 49 - 47 . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) have been struggling mightily this season , but they showed some serious resiliency in this blowout win . In fact , Philadelphia outscored Phoenix , 34 - 30 , in the fourth quarter to seal the victory . The key for the Sixers was their defense , as they held the Suns to 42 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Sixers recording 33 assists to 18 turnovers , while the Suns committed 18 turnovers to just 18 assists . The Suns ( 4 - 9 ) had to play this game without Devin Booker , Eric Bledsoe , Alex Len and Marquese Chriss and they simply did n't have enough in the tank to keep up with the 76ers . Booker finished with just 10 points on 4 - of - 13 shooting , while Len had nine points , seven rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Chriss had six points , two rebounds and an assist in 20 minutes . Alan Williams was the only other starter in double figures , as he tallied 12 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Phoenix will look to play better on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers . The 76ers were led by Joel Embiid , who scored a game - high 26 points , to go along with seven rebounds and two blocks . Dario Saric was second on the team in scoring , dropping 21 points on 8 - for - 9 shooting off the pine . Sergio Rodriguez recorded a double - double , totaling eight points , eight rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . Ersan Ilyasova started in place of Nerlens Noel and finished with 11 points and two rebounds . Gerald Henderson and Nik Stauskas each scored 11 points as well . Philadelphia 's next game will be on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks .

The Cavaliers were able to use a strong second half to pull away from the Hawks , as they outscored them 30 - 23 in the second half and held them to just 38 percent shooting from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . Kyrie Irving followed up with 21 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , eight assists , one rebound , one steal and two blocks , in 34 minutes . Kevin Love chipped in 17 points ( 4 - 17 FG ) and 11 rebounds , in 38 minutes , while Tristan Thompson added eight points ( 3 - 6 FG ) , 14 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , in 40 minutes . J.R. Smith added 12 points , five rebounds and three assists , while Kyle Korver was held scoreless in 37 minutes . The Hawks were led by Paul Millsap , who finished with 17 points and 13 rebounds , while Kent Bazemore added 16 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 36 minutes . Atlanta , on the other hand , will look for their first win of the series when they host the Pistons on Tuesday .

Ian Mahinmi was productive as a reserve as well , registering six points , nine rebounds , five assists and two steals . The Pacers ' bench outscored the Hornets ' bench , 52 - 38 . Indiana remains in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and is currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well ahead of the eighth - seeded Toronto Raptors . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Friday night . Charlotte , meanwhile , remains in fourth place in its conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home again Friday night for a date with the Nets .

The Portland Trail Blazers ( 36 - 34 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 25 - 43 ) 117 - 112 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 36 - 30 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the game , as the Pelicans never led by more than seven points in the second half . Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum did most of the damage for the Trail Blazers in this game . Lillard finished with 33 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 12 - 12 FT ) , eight rebounds and six assists in 35 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line 12 times , converting on 12 - of - 12 . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 assists on the season . McColum on the other hand finished with 30 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 4 - 7 3Pk , 4 of 5 FT ) of his own , along with six assists and three rebounds in 36 minutes . It was his second 30 - point game in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 6 assists . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Allen Crabbe , who finished with 19 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) and six rebounds in 28 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans got most of their production from Jrue Holiday , who went 10 - 21 from the field and 2 - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding seven rebounds and three assists in 37 minutes . Holiday 's 30 points were a season - high for him , as he did n't have to do much else with Anthony Davis struggling to find his shot . Davis shot just 8 - 18 from the floor and scored 19 points in 14 minutes of action . Davis has been dealing with an ankle injury for the majority of the season , so it was good to see him get back on the court after sitting out the last two games . Toney Douglas played 31 minutes and finished with 12 points , six assists , one rebound and two steals in that time . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Pelicans will travel to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Friday .

However , the Knicks were able to out - score the T-Wolves 25 - 30 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . He 's now averaging 19 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The Boston Celtics defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 116 - 96 , at TD Garden on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 39 - 26 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt with this win . In fact , Boston led for the entirety of the second half , as they never relinquished the lead after the first quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Celtics recording 26 assists to 13 turnovers , while the Grizzlies committed 20 turnovers to 20 assists . The Grizzlies ( 38 - 25 ) have now lost four of their last five games , as this marks their seventh loss in their last eight games . JaMychal Green was the lone bright spot for Memphis , as he tallied 17 points and 13 rebounds in the defeat . Zach Randolph was second on the team , providing 16 points and six rebounds off the bench . Matt Barnes and Tony Allen each finished with 12 points , while Mario Chalmers accrued 11 points , five rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . On deck for the Grizzlies is a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday . Boston had to play this game without Jae Crowder and Marcus Smart , but they did n't miss a beat . Isaiah Thomas was the player of the game , accumulating 22 points , three rebounds and five assists in the win . Avery Bradley and Jared Sullinger also scored 15 points a piece . Kelly Olynyk led the bench in scoring , dropping 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Up next for the Celtics is a matchup with the New York Knicks on Friday , in what will be a crucial matchup for both teams .

The Knicks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they outscored the Pacers 40 - 24 in the second half to pull out the win . The key for the Knicks was their defense , as they held the Pacers to just 44 percent shooting from the field and 27 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Knicks recording 19 assists to just 14 turnovers , while the Pacers committed 11 turnovers to just 18 assists . Carmelo Anthony led the Knicks in scoring , as he tallied 26 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , five rebounds and two assists . Derrick Rose was n't far behind , finishing with 20 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) and six assists . Courtney Lee was the only other Knick in double figures , totaling 14 points ( 3 - 7 FG ) , four rebounds and one assist . Justin Holiday came off the bench to provide 14 points and 10 rebounds . The Pacers were led by Paul George , who scored a game - high 31 points ( 11 - 24 FG , 3 - 10 3PT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . Myles Turner finished with 22 points ( 8 - 12 FG ) and ten rebounds , while C.J . Miles chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 2 - 9 3PT . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pacers was Al Jefferson , who finished with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) in 19 minutes . Jeff Teague struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 9 from the floor and 1 - for 3 from three point range to score seven points , while adding seven assists and four rebounds in 36 minutes . Next up , the Knicks will head to Toronto to take on the Raptors on Friday , while Indiana will stay home and play the Nets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 10 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) 115 - 84 in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena to take a 1 - 1 series lead over the Raptors . LeBron James led the way for the Cavs with 24 points on 11 - of - 13 shooting from the field , to go along with six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , in 28 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 27 points , five assists and two steals , in 30 minutes , while Kevin Love chipped in 14 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 27 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 55 percent from the floor and 35 percent from three - point range , while holding the Raptors to 42 percent shooting and 21 percent from long range . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who finished with 18 points and five assists , in 35 minutes . Bismack Biyombo finished with 12 points on 5 - of 5 shooting , in 31 minutes . Kyle Lowry finished with eight points on 4 - of 14 shooting , including 0 - for - 7 from deep , in 32 minutes . DeMarre Carroll was limited to 20 minutes due to foul trouble , as he finished with two points , two rebounds , one assist , one steal and two blocks , in 20 minutes . Game 2 will take place in Toronto on Tuesday . Cleveland will look to extend their winning streak to 10 games , as they travel to Indiana to take on the Pacers .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 24 - 17 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 11 - 30 ) 114 - 86 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 27 - 23 in the first quarter and 29 - 18 in the second quarter . The Nets were n't able to keep up with the Hawks in the third quarter , as they were out - scored 30 - 18 , allowing the Hawks to run away with the game . Atlanta shot 56 percent from the field and 28 percent from beyond the arc , while holding the Nets to 44 percent shooting and 30 percent from three - point range . Paul Millsap led the Hawks with 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , six rebounds and three assists , while Kent Bazemore added 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , three assists and one steal , in 27 minutes . Jeff Teague finished with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) , seven assists and three rebounds , in 23 minutes . Dennis Schroder recorded a double - double off the bench , with 15 points and 10 assists , along with six rebounds , three steals and one block , in 20 minutes . Thaddeus Young led the Nets in scoring , as he finished with 18 points and seven rebounds , while Joe Johnson added 14 points and four rebounds . The only other player to score in double figures for the Nets was Joe Johnson , who finished with 14 points , in 26 minutes . Donald Sloan finished with just four points ( 1 - 5 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , but dished out 12 assists , to go along with four rebounds , four steals and three blocks , in 25 minutes . Up next , the Nets will head to New Orleans to take on the Pelicans on Friday , while the Hawks will stay home and play the Pistons on Friday .

The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Wizards 35 - 21 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They never trailed in the second quarter , as they went on to out - score the Wizards 33 - 21 over the final 12 minutes . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 33 assists to just 14 turnovers , while the Wizards committed nine turnovers to just nine assists . Redick was n't far behind , finishing with 26 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 4 - 7 3PT ) and two assists in 35 minutes . McCollum led the way for the Blazers . Lillard finished with 31 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 8 - 14 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , nine assists and seven rebounds in 37 minutes . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 116 - 92 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday . The Clippers ( 5 - 1 ) have been dominant on the road this season , and they showed why in this blowout win over the Spurs . The key for Los Angeles was their defense , as they held San Antonio to 41 percent shooting from the field and 40 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Clippers recording 24 assists to just eight turnovers , while the Spurs committed 15 turnovers to just 19 assists . Blake Griffin was the player of the game , as he tallied 28 points , five rebounds and three assists on 13 - of - 19 shooting . Chris Paul was the only other Clipper to reach double figures , accumulating nine points , eight rebounds and 10 assists . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , three rebounds and two assists . J.J. Redick and Luc Mbah a Moute each scored 14 points , while DeAndre Jordan grabbed eight boards and dished out three blocks . The only other player to score in double digits for the Clippers was Jamal Crawford , who provided six points , six rebounds and eight assists in 22 minutes of action . Los Angeles will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder . The Spurs ( 5 2 ) had a tough task here without Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge and they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to get the job done . Leonard finished with 14 points and six rebounds , while Aldridge scored 19 points on 7 - of 13 shots . Patty Mills and Gasol scored just four points a piece , but combined for 17 rebounds and five assists in the loss . San Antonio 's next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 26 - 27 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to coast to the victory , as they held the Knicks to just 14 points in the second quarter and 14 in the third quarter . Gerald Green led the Heat in scoring with 25 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line , to go along with two rebounds and one steal , in 27 minutes . Chris Bosh followed up with 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , five rebounds and three assists , in 31 minutes . Dwyane Wade chipped in 17 points of his own , while Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double with six points and 14 rebounds , along with six blocks , six steals and one assist , in 30 minutes . Goran Dragic struggled shooting , going 3 - of 8 from behind the arc , but still finished with nine points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 29 minutes . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who finished with 11 points ( 4 - 13 FG ) , three rebounds , one assist and one block , in 34 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis added 11 points and eight rebounds , in 24 minutes , while starting for the injured Joakim Noah , who sat this one out with an ankle soreness . Justin Holiday Innngitis , in 17 minutes off the bench , finished with 10 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) and three rebounds . With Noah out , Jose Calderon moved into the starting lineup at point guard . He finished with four points ( 2 - 5 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and one rebound , in 25 minutes . Starting at shooting guard , Arron Afflalo struggled , going 2 - of 7 - for- 7 from the floor and 0 - for 1 from beyond the arc to score four points , in 19 minutes . With the loss , the Knicks are now 1 - 6 on the road this season . Up next , the Heat will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , while the Knicks will head to Toronto to play the Raptors on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 10 - 6 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 6 - 8 ) 105 - 99 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Raptors were able to hold off the Bucks in this one , as they out - scored the Bucks 32 - 25 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Bucks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out a wire - to - wire win , but the Raptors had other ideas . They out - rebounded the Bucks 38 - 38 and held them to just 51 percent shooting from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line . DeMar DeRozan was the player of the game , as he tallied 26 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , seven rebounds and four assists in 35 minutes . Kyle Lowry finished with 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) , five rebounds and six assists in 37 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Raptors was DeMarre Carroll , who finished with 14 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and four three - pointers in 26 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo had one of his best games of the season . He finished with 29 points ( 12 - 17 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and 11 assists , while also adding six rebounds and one steal . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 10 rebounds . Tony Snell was the only other Bucks player to reach double figures in points . He went 6 - for 12 points and 4 - for 10 rebounds in 33 minutes . Jabari Parker and Matthew Dellavedova each scored 14 points , with Parker adding four rebounds and two steals . The other three Bucks players combined to go 8 - for - 26 from the floor and 1 - for 11 from the free throw line . The loss snapped a three - game win streak for the Bucks , as it was their first loss in their last four games . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the New York Knicks . Meanwhile , the Raptors ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Sacramento Kings , 106 - 98 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . The Kings ( 5 - 3 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking for their first road win of the season , but the Mavs had other ideas , as they came out firing on all cylinders in the first half , outscoring the visitors by a 34 - 14 margin over the second and third quarters . The Mav 's offense was on point , as the team shot 48 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range , while the Kings could only muster up a 44 percent success rate . Rudy Gay led the way for the Kings with 26 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Ramon Sessions was next with 18 points , while DeMarcus Cousins posted a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and five blocks . Ben McLemore was solid in a reserve role as well with 17 points , four rebounds , a steal and a block . Darren Collison led the bench with 11 points , three rebounds and a steal . Dirk Nowitzki paced the Mavericks with 23 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one block . Chandler Parsons and Monta Ellis were next with matching 19 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and three assists , and the latter supplying four assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Tyson Chandler turned in a 14 - point effort that also featured 11 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a pair of blocks . J.J. Barea Barea led the second unit with 12 points , five assists , three steals and a trio of rebounds . Devin Harris Boozer chipped in with 10 points and three blocks off the bench as well . Dallas improved to 5 - 4 and currently resides in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They head to Houston to take on the Rockets on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Kings remain home and await the New Orleans Pelicans for a Friday night showdown .
