Jonas Valanciunas finished with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) and eight rebounds , while Greivis Vasquez chipped in 11 points , seven assists and five rebounds , in 32 minutes . Lou Williams was the only other player to score in double figures for the Raptors , as he added 16 points , five rebounds and three assists , in 31 minutes off the bench . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for Toronto , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . The win brings Boston to within two games of the eighth - place Toronto in the Eastern Conference standings . Evan Turner was the high - point man for the Celtics , with 14 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) , along with nine assists , seven rebounds and one blocked shot , in 30 minutes . Avery Bradley added 14 points , while starting at shooting guard . Brandon Bass finished with 13 points and nine rebounds . Tyler Zeller finished with 12 points and eight boards , in 26 minutes . Marcus Smart struggled shooting , going 4 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for 4 from the three - point line , but still finished with nine points . Marcus Thornton added 11 points and six assists in 27 minutes , while Kelly Olynyk added nine points and four rebounds , as a reserve , in 21 minutes . With the loss , the Celtics are now just a half - game behind the eighth place Toronto Raptors in the East , and they 'll have to travel to Washington to take on the Wizards on Friday for their next game . Meanwhile , the Raptors will be right back in action on Friday , when they play the second game of a back - to - back .

The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 20 - 12 in the first quarter and 39 - 24 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Cavaliers were n't able to keep up with the Celtics in the fourth quarter . Smith added 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 5 - 10 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds , in 33 minutes . The Cavaliers shot just 43 percent from the field and 27 percent from beyond the arc , while the Celtics shot 43 percent ( 43 - 35 FG , 35 - 84 FT ) . Isaiah Thomas led the Celtics with 22 points ( 5 - 19 FG , 11 - 11 FT ) of his own , along with four rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 24 points and 6 assists on the season . Kelly Olynyk added 16 points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 20 minutes . The Cavs , on the other hand , are off until Friday , when they host the Toronto Raptors for their next game .
The Washington Wizards ( 20 - 8 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 26 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 34 - 23 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Knicks never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who scored a game - high 34 points ( 13 - 28 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds and two assists in 43 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 27 points , 10 rebounds and 5 assists . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Jose Calderon , who finished with 16 points ( 5 / 14 FG , 2 - 7 3Pd , 4 - 4 FT ) and four assists in 36 minutes . The win brings the Wizards ' record to 10 - 7 on the road this season . John Wall led the way for the Wizards , as he finished with 24 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , six rebounds and 11 assists . He was able to get to the free throw line 11 times , converting on 10 of those attempts . Bradley Beal was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 16 FG ) , five rebounds and five assists . Nene added 12 points ( 6 - 8 FG ) and two rebounds , while Marcin Gortat chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) with nine rebounds , two blocks and one steal in 30 minutes . Otto Porter , Jr. came off the bench to score 14 points and grab six rebounds in 29 minutes , marking his first double - double - digit scoring performance of the season . The loss puts the Wizards back at the bottom of the Eastern Conference standings , but they 're still in the top eight in the East . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday , when they host the Toronto Raptors for their next game . Meanwhile , the Knicks ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

The Washington Wizards ( 23 - 19 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 19 - 25 ) 113 - 110 at Madison Square Garden on Friday . The Wizards came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left with a huge road win . The key for Washington was their defense , as they held the Knicks to 47 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with the Wizards recording 29 assists to just 15 turnovers , while the Knicks committed 10 turnovers to just 20 assists . John Wall was the player of the game , as he tallied 29 points , five rebounds , 13 assists and three steals . Otto Porter , Jr. was second on the team with 23 points and five rebounds . Marcin Gortat recorded a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double , while Markieff Morris finished with 14 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks . On deck for the Wizards is a home matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday . Carmelo Anthony did his best to keep the Knicks in this game , but it was n't enough . Anthony finished with 34 points , 10 rebounds and two assists on 13 - of - 27 shooting . Derrick Rose and Kyle O'Quinn tied for the team - high with 20 points a piece , while Lance Thomas added 15 points off the bench . The Knicks will look to get back on track on Sunday in a road matchup with the Los Angeles Clippers .

The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 28 - 24 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . Golden State shot 49 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range , while holding the Cavaliers to 38 percent shooting from the floor and a meager 33 percent figure from beyond the arc . Draymond Green led the way for the Warriors , finishing with 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 11 rebounds , seven assists , four steals and one block , in 40 minutes . Marreese Speights chipped in 20 points ( 8 - 10 FG ) , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 27 minutes off the bench , while Andre Iguodala added 12 points , seven rebounds , six assists , one steal and one blocked shot , in 36 minutes . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who finished with 23 points , 12 rebounds , nine assists , two steals and two blocks , in 41 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 26 points ( 7 - 22 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 11 - 12 FT ) and four assists , in 38 minutes , while Kevin Love added 17 points and 13 rebounds , in 37 minutes . Tristan Thompson finished with 10 points and 12 rebounds in 31 minutes , and J.R. Smith had three points , one assist and one rebound , in 35 minutes . Stephen Curry struggled shooting , going 4 - for 15 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 3 - 8 3PT ) , while Klay Thompson went just 4 - 12 FG , with nine points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocked shots , in 24 minutes . Andrew Bogut and Harrison Barnes finished with 13 and 11 points , respectively , in 30 minutes , with Barnes also adding two assists , a rebound and a steal , and Bogut adding three rebounds and two steals , in 15 minutes . With the win , the Warriors improved to 10 - 1 at home , while the Cavaliers fall to 0 - 2 . Game 2 will take place at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland on Friday night .
The Toronto Raptors ( 19 - 12 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 12 - 19 ) 111 - 90 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 34 - 17 in the first quarter and 35 - 11 in the second quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the half . The Bucks battled back in the third quarter , but the Raptors were able to hold on to the lead for the rest of the game , as they out - scored the Bucks 35 - 20 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Raps shot 52 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , while the Bucks shot 42 percent from beyond the arc and 43 percent from long range . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors in scoring with 22 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , eight assists and three rebounds , in 33 minutes . Kyle Lowry added 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) and nine assists , while Bismack Biyombo chipped in 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 4 - 7 FT ) and 12 rebounds , along with four blocked shots , in 27 minutes . Luis Scola finished with 17 points and 11 rebounds , while Terrence Ross added 18 points and three steals , in 29 minutes off the bench . Khris Middleton led the way for the Bucks , with 20 points and seven assists , in 37 minutes , while Greg Monroe added 19 points and 10 rebounds . Giannis Antetokounmpo was held to just four points ( 2 - 5 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 2 FT ) in 35 minutes . Michael Carter-Williams and Jabari Parker were the only other Bucks players to score in double figures , with eight and nine points respectively , in 32 and 33 minutes , respectively . Next up , the Raptors will head home to take on the Pacers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Meanwhile , the Bucks will look to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Pacers .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 22 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 14 - 23 ) 121 - 106 on Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 36 - 22 in the first quarter , but the Nuggets battled back in the second quarter to make it a one - point game . However , the Thunder were able to out - score the Nuggets 33 - 20 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to pull away and secure the victory . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder , finishing with 32 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 7 - 12 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 17 rebounds and 11 assists in 35 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 58 times , converting on 17 of those attempts . Steven Adams finished with 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds in 31 minutes . Victor Oladipo chipped in 15 points and three rebounds in 33 minutes . Enes Kanter had 14 points and six rebounds in 21 minutes off the bench , while Andre Roberson added 13 points and nine rebounds in 39 minutes . The Nuggets were led by Will Barton , who finished with 21 points and seven rebounds in 28 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic recorded his first double - double of the season with 11 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 FT ) in 26 minutes , while also adding nine rebounds and three steals . Jameer Linas Kanter was the only other Nugget to score in double figures , as he finished with 24 points and eight rebounds in 32 minutes . Danilo Gallinari finished with 15 points , seven rebounds and one steal , while Will Barton added 13 of his own , in 22 minutes . Darrell Arthur and Will Barton were the only two other Nuggets to reach double figures in points , as they finished with 10 and 13 points respectively . Up next , the Nuggets will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Thunder will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Wednesday . This marks the second game of a back - to - back for both teams , as the Thunder and Spurs will be in San Antonio on Tuesday .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 7 - 6 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 13 ) 113 - 88 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Hornets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 30 - 19 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . In fact , the Hornets out - scored the Sixers 60 - 38 in the second quarter , giving them a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . They also shot 49 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range , while holding the Sixers to just 41 percent shooting and 31 percent from long range . Al Jefferson was the player of the game , as he led the Hornets with 26 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , 10 rebounds and five blocks in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker was n't far behind , finishing with 20 points and seven assists of his own , while Nicolas Batum chipped in 14 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and four rebounds in 32 minutes . Marvin Williams finished with 11 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) and nine rebounds in 29 minutes , while Marco Belinelli added 13 points and three rebounds in 30 minutes off the bench . The Sixers were led by a 16 - point effort from Jahlil Okafor , who shot 7 - for - 9 from the floor and 2 - for 4 for 4 from the free throw line to score 16 points in 27 minutes . Nik Stauskas added 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) and three assists , while starting at point guard . Jerami Grant finished with 12 points and five rebounds in 24 minutes . T.J. McConnell was the only other starter in double figures , scoring five points ( 2 - 8 FG ) to go with seven rebounds , six assists and one steal . The only other player to score in double digits for Philadelphia was Dario Saric , who finished with eight points and two rebounds in 21 minutes . The 76ers will look to get out of this slide on Friday in a road matchup against the New York Knicks , while the Hornets will travel to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday .
The Boston Celtics ( 13 - 23 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 18 - 19 ) 108 - 100 on Monday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 22 - 22 in the first quarter and 36 - 24 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the Pelicans to just 41 percent shooting from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while also out - rebounding them 44 - 45 . Jared Sullinger led the way for the Celtics with 27 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 32 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 19 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Jae Crowder had a nice game as well , finishing with 22 points , three rebounds , three assists , four steals and two blocks in 36 minutes . Evan Turner chipped in 10 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one steal in 25 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 34 points ( 10 - 23 FG , 14 - 15 FT ) , nine rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 40 minutes . It was his third straight game with at least 30 points , as he continues to be a force on the offensive end . Eric Gordon had 21 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) of his own , to go along with three assists and two rebounds . The only other Pelican to score in double digits was E'Twaun Moore , who came off the bench and finished with 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists in 35 minutes . Up next , the Pelicans will head home to take on the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday , while the Celtics will head to New York to play the Knicks on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 10 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 0 - 1 ) 102 - 98 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 29 - 32 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the game , as the Timberwolves were n't able to keep up with them in the second and third quarters . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies , finishing with 24 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt ) , four assists and one rebound , in 30 minutes . Marc Gasol finished with 18 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) , three rebounds , two assists and four blocked shots , in 32 minutes . Zach Randolph was huge off the bench , as he finished with 19 points and 11 rebounds , in 25 minutes , while James Ennis III chipped in 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , six rebounds and one steal , in 28 minutes . For the Timberwolves , it was Andrew Wiggins and Karl-Anthony Towns who did most of the damage . Wiggins went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - 1 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding seven rebounds , one block and one assist , in 34 minutes . Towns finished with 21 points , four rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Gorgui Dieng recorded his first double - double of the season , with 12 points and 14 rebounds , along with two assists , two steals , two blocks and one blocked shot , in 33 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Timberwolves was Zach LaVine , who finished with a team - high of 19 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3- 6 3PT . The Timberwolves shot just 42 percent from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc , as they were unable to keep pace with the Grizzlies . Up next , the Grizzlies will head home Friday to take on the Hornets , while the Timberwolves will head to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Friday .
The Miami Heat ( 22 - 30 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 19 - 33 ) 115 - 113 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 40 - 33 in the first quarter , but the Timberwolves battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth . However , the Heat were able to out - score the Timberwolves 22 - 25 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory and keep their playoff hopes alive . Goran Dragic led the Heat with 33 points ( 13 - 17 FG , 7 - 9 3Pt ) and nine assists in 35 minutes . Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double with 19 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds in 36 minutes . Rodney McGruder finished with 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG ) and five rebounds in 39 minutes , while Dion Waiters chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 13 FG ) , five assists , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks in 33 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for the Timberwolves with a game - high of 35 points , as he shot 13 - 20 from the field and 2 - 3 from the three - point line , to go along with eight rebounds and two steals in 38 minutes . Andrew Wiggins finished with 27 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) and four rebounds in 37 minutes . Ricky Rubio added 14 points and 13 assists , while Gorgui Dieng finished with 13 points and seven rebounds . The Timberwolves shot 54 percent from the floor and 46 percent from beyond the arc , but were out - rebounded by the Heat 38 - 38 . Next up , the Timberwolves play the second game of a back - to back when they host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . The Miami Heat play their second game in as many nights , as they play host to the Orlando Magic on Friday night . This marks the Timberwolves ' third game in four nights and they 'll look to get back on track when they take on the Oklahoma City Thunder on Saturday night .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Chicago Bulls , 98 - 94 , in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Palace of Auburn Hills . The Pistons ( 3 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run to get there . In fact , Detroit outscored Chicago , 29 - 19 , in the fourth quarter to pull out the win . The key for the Pistons was their defense , as they held the Bulls to 41 percent shooting from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . They also forced 19 turnovers from Chicago , while committing just 18 of their own . Marcus Morris led the way for Detroit , as he tallied 26 points , seven rebounds and two assists on 10 - of - 15 shooting in 42 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double , totaling 20 points and 20 rebounds in 39 minutes . Reggie Jackson was second on the team with 22 points , while adding seven rebounds , seven assists and two steals in 37 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Detroit was Tobias Harris , who chipped in 11 points in 30 minutes off the bench . Jimmy Butler led the Bulls with 23 points , 11 rebounds and three steals . Nikola Mirotic was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 22 points and six rebounds . Pau Gasol finished with 16 points , 12 rebounds , three assists , two steals and three blocks in 32 minutes . Derrick Rose struggled with his shot , going 4 - for - 13 from the floor and finishing with eight points , six assists and five turnovers in 34 minutes . Game 4 will be held in Chicago on Tuesday in Detroit . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers . Detroit will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 2 - 4 ) 97 - 85 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 39 - 28 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . In fact , the Thunder led by as many as 24 points in the second quarter , as they were able to coast to a comfortable victory in front of their home crowd . Oklahoma City shot 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while holding the Heat to 37 percent shooting and 24 percent from long range . The Heat were led by Tyler Johnson , who scored 18 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and two blocked shots in 25 minutes off the bench . He 's now averaging 18 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Goran Dragic was the only other Miami player to score in double figures , as he finished with 11 points and four assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double with five points and 12 rebounds , while also adding two blocks and two steals . Dion Waiters struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 9 from the floor and scoring only two points , but he did dish out four assists in 27 minutes of action . The only other player to reach double figures in points for the Thunder was Enes Kanter , who finished with 24 points and 10 rebounds in just 21 minutes . Russell Westbrook recorded 14 points , five rebounds and 11 assists , while Victor Oladipo chipped in 17 points of his own . Domantas Sabonis recorded a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double double , and added an assist and a steal . Steven Adams and Andre Roberson were the only two Thunder players to play more than 30 minutes , as Adams finished with six points , six rebounds , three steals and two blocks , while Roberson had five points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals in 30 minutes . Next up , the Heat will head to Houston to take on the Rockets on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

The New Orleans Pelicans ( 15 - 14 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 18 - 13 ) 97 - 90 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Spurs 20 - 20 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 22 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and five blocks in 38 minutes . Jrue Holiday added 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and seven assists in 35 minutes , while Tyreke Evans chipped in 11 points ( 3 - 9 FG ) , five assists and three rebounds in 30 minutes . In 33 minutes off the bench , E'Twaun Moore scored a team - high of 22 points , to go along with seven rebounds , two assists and one steal in 33 minutes . Tim Duncan had a double - double with 20 points and 11 rebounds , while Cory Joseph added 20 points of his own and five assists . The only other player to score in double figures for the Spurs was Manu Ginobili , who had 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and five rebounds in 25 minutes . The Spurs shot 49 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range , but were out - rebounded 44 - 39 and out - scored in the paint by the Pelicans 44 - 38 . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for San Antonio , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . Up next , the Spurs will head to Houston to take on the Rockets on Friday , while the Pelicans will travel to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 51 - 28 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 39 - 40 ) 102 - 99 on Wednesday at EnergySolutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Clippers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the majority of the game , as the Jazz never led by more than seven points in the second half . The key for the Clippers was their defense , as they held the Jazz to just 44 percent shooting from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Clippers recording 16 assists to 11 turnovers , while the Jazz committed 18 turnovers to just 14 assists . The Jazz were led by Gordon Hayward , who tallied 24 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , 13 rebounds and five assists in 46 minutes . Derrick Favors finished with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 37 minutes . Rodney Hood and Shelvin Mack were the only other Jazz players to score in double figures , as each finished with 13 points and 13 points respectively . Jamal Crawford led the Clippers in scoring , as he dropped 30 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 4 - 11 3PT , 8 - 10 FT ) to go along with five rebounds and four assists in 49 minutes . Cole Aldrich finished with 21 points ( 10 - 15 FG ) and 18 rebounds in 40 minutes , while Paul Pierce added 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) , two assists and three steals in 33 minutes . The only other Clipper to reach double figures was Jamal Crawford , as Austin Rivers chipped in 18 points in 36 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Clippers will head home to take on the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while Utah will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 26 - 35 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 10 - 51 ) 130 - 116 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 37 - 27 in the first quarter and 40 - 34 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 57 percent from the field and 64 percent from three - point range , while holding the Nets to 52 percent shooting from the floor and 47 percent from long range . C.J . McCollum led the way for the Trail Blazers , scoring a game - high 31 points ( 13 - 22 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and five assists , in 38 minutes . Damian Lillard added 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and 11 assists , while Maurice Harkless chipped in 18 points ( 6 - 7 FG ) , two rebounds , three assists , two steals and four blocks , in 30 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic added 17 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 29 minutes . Meyers Leonard came off the bench to score 23 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) in 32 minutes , while adding six rebounds and one assist . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who finished with 26 points ( 11 - 19 FG ) and five rebounds , along with one assist , two blocks , one steal and one three - pointer , in 31 minutes . Jeremy Lin added 18 points and three rebounds , in 22 minutes . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson added 12 points and eight rebounds , while Quincy Acyn added seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 27 minutes . Sean Kilpatrick was the only other player to score in double figures for the Nets , as he finished with 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , including 6 - of 7 from deep , in 26 minutes . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 2 - 3 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 1 - 4 ) 119 - 114 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Magic 34 - 35 in the first quarter and 34 - 24 in the second quarter , but the Magic battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Rockets out - scored the Magic 20 - 22 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Magic were led by Evan Fournier , who scored a game - high 29 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and four assists , in 46 minutes . Victor Oladipo was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , as he finished with 18 points ( 7 - 16 FG ) , along with seven rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 44 minutes . Tobias Harris chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and five rebounds , in 21 minutes , while Nikola Vucevic was held to just six points ( 3 - 6 FG ) in 17 minutes . Dwight Howard was the star of the show for the Rockets . He finished with 23 points ( 10 - 10 FT ) and 14 rebounds in 31 minutes . He 's now averaging 23 points and 12 rebounds on the season . James Harden finished with 28 points , seven rebounds and five assists , while going 6 - for - 22 from the field and 2 - for 11 from the three - point line . Trevor Ariza added 19 points ( 4 - 7 3PT ) and seven rebounds in 41 minutes . Marcus Thornton added 18 points , while Ty Lawson finished with 16 points , eight assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 40 minutes . As a team the Rockets shot 48 percent from the floor and 32 percent from deep , while the Magic shot 51 percent ( 35 - 79 percent ) from the free - throw line . Next up , the Magic will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back , while Houston will stay home and play the Grizzlies on Friday .

The Bucks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 41 - 19 in the first quarter and 41 - 12 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Raptors were n't able to keep up with the Bucks in the fourth quarter . Khris Middleton was the high - point man for the Bucks , with 24 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds and one steal , in 30 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo finished with 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) , 10 rebounds and four assists , in 35 minutes , while Malcolm Brogdon added 17 points and five rebounds , in 42 minutes . Greg Monroe chipped in 16 points and eight rebounds off the bench , in 17 minutes . The Raptors were led by Serge Ibaka , who went 7 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - 2 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding five rebounds and two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Cory Joseph finished with 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and eight assists , while Jonas Valanciunas added 13 points and seven rebounds in 21 minutes . DeMar DeRozan finished with 11 points , four assists and three rebounds , while Terrence Ross Ulis added 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) in 26 minutes , in his second game back from a knee injury . Up next , the Raptors will head to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday , while the Bucks will go on the road to Detroit to play the Pistons on Friday .

The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 29 - 19 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Cavaliers to just 42 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 48 - 45 . Kyrie Irving followed up with 23 points ( 10 - 22 FG ) , seven rebounds , six assists and four steals , in 44 minutes . Timofey Mozgov added 16 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and seven rebounds in 33 minutes , while Tristan Thompson chipped in 15 points ( 1 - 4 FG ) to go along with 15 rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 47 minutes . Stephen Curry led the Warriors in scoring with 26 points , eight assists , four rebounds , two steals and two blocks , in 43 minutes . Klay Thompson added 21 points and six rebounds , in 39 minutes . Draymond Green finished with 12 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and three assists , six rebounds and two steals , while Harrison Barnes finished with 11 points ( 3 - 5 3PT ) and six boards , in 38 minutes . Marreese Speights . Andre Iguodala , in 32 minutes off the bench , finished with 15 points and three rebounds , while Shaun Livingston added 15 points , two assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Cavaliers have a quick turnaround , as they play the second game of a back - to - back on Tuesday , when they host the Portland Trail Blazers . Golden State will look to extend their win streak to 10 games , when the Warriors host the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday .

The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 8 - 8 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 6 - 11 ) 101 - 91 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 29 - 28 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Kings never led by more than seven points in the second half . Andrew Wiggins and Zach LaVine led the way for the Timberwolves , scoring 22 and 19 points , respectively , in the win . Wiggins shot 8 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - of - 3 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding six rebounds and one block . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Zach La Vine also had a nice game , scoring 19 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 12 assists over those last two games . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Shabazz Muhammad , who scored 15 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 2 - 8 3PT ) and grabbed four rebounds in 16 minutes off the bench . The Kings were led by Rajon Rondo , who recorded 16 points , 16 assists and four rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line 16 times and converted on 10 of those attempts . Kosta Koufos was the most of the time , finishing with 16 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) and 13 rebounds in 30 minutes . He did n't get much help from the rest of the starting lineup , as Rudy Gay and Willie Cauley-Stein combined for just 11 points on 5 - 19 shooting . Darren Collin Sexton was the only other Kings player to score in double figures . He finished with 17 points , two rebounds and two assists in 34 minutes . The Wolves ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Kings will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 50 - 20 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 29 - 42 ) 124 - 91 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 38 - 23 in the first quarter and 37 - 19 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Nuggets were n't able to keep up . The Cavs shot 56 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range , while the Nuggets shot just 40 percent and 36 percent , respectively . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers with 33 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 11 assists , in 33 minutes . J.R. Smith added 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , five assists and four steals , in 29 minutes . Channing Frye chipped in 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) , three rebounds , two assists and one block , in 25 minutes , while Timofey Mozgov added nine points ( 3 - 4 FG ) and four rebounds , in 21 minutes . Tristan Thompson was the only other Cavalier to score in double figures , as he finished with eight points ( 4 - 5 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) in 22 minutes off the bench . The Nuggets were led by Jamal Murray , who went 9 - for - 12 from the free throw line and 5 - for 6 from the charity stripe to score 27 points , in 26 minutes . Gary Harris finished with 11 points and two rebounds , while Nikola Jokic added 11 points , seven rebounds , three assists , three steals and one steal , in 23 minutes . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Darrell Arthur , who finished with four points , five rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home to take on the Pacers on Friday , while Denver will head to Chicago to play the Bulls on Friday . This was the second game of a back - to - back for the Cavs , as they 'll look to extend their winning streak to four games .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 106 - 99 - 106 , in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Verizon Center . The Raptors ( 0 - 3 ) were expected to win this game easily , but the Wizards ( 3 - 2 ) had other ideas . Washington outscored the Raptors 33 - 13 in the first quarter and held them to just 13 points the rest of the way . The Wizards shot 47 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range , while holding the Raptors to 37 percent shooting and 36 percent from long range . DeMar DeRozan was the high - point man for the Raptors , with 32 points on 11 - of - 29 shooting , to go along with six rebounds and six assists , in 41 minutes . Amir Johnson finished with 14 points and 12 rebounds , while Kyle Lowry chipped in 15 points , seven assists , four rebounds and four steals , in 38 minutes . Marcin Gortat led the way for the Wizards , with 24 points , 13 rebounds , five assists and four blocks , in 42 minutes . John Wall finished with 19 points , 15 assists , five rebounds and one steal , in 43 minutes , while Paul Pierce added 18 points and three rebounds , in 27 minutes . Bradley Beal finished with 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and three blocks , while Kelly Oubre , Jr. added 12 points and seven rebounds in 18 minutes off the bench . Otto Porter Jr. finished with 11 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block , in 33 minutes . The series now shifts back to Toronto for Game 4 on Tuesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 34 - 24 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 37 - 21 ) 107 - 97 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . DeMar DeRozan was unstoppable in this game , as he scored a game - high 43 points ( 15 - 28 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 12 - 12 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and five assists , in 37 minutes . It was his second 43 - point game in a row , and he 's now scored at least 40 points in each of his last three games . The Raptors were also able to hold the Celtics to 42 percent shooting from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while the Raptors shot 49 percent from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics were led by Isaiah Thomas , who scored 20 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 3 - 10 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) and added five assists and three rebounds , in 35 minutes . Jae Crowder finished with 19 points and four rebounds , while Jaylen Brown added 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , two assists , one steal and one block , in 28 minutes . Al Horford finished with eight points ( 3 - 5 FG ) , five rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 30 minutes , while Kelly Olynyk chipped in 19 points in 32 minutes off the bench , including 6 - 15 shooting ( 1 - 7 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) . Jonas Valanciunas and DeMarre Carroll were the only two Raptors players to score in double figures , as they combined , with seven points . Cory Joseph Joseph added 11 points , six assists , three steals and one rebound , in 36 minutes . Serge Ibaka finished with 15 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and seven rebounds , along with one steal . The only one other player to reach double figures in points for Toronto was Patrick Patterson , who finished with 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) in 17 minutes , in addition to two rebounds and one assist , two steals , in his first game back after missing the last seven games with an ankle injury . The Raps are now on a three - game win streak , and have won four of their last five . They 'll look to extend that streak when they take on the road against the Indiana Pacers on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for the Raptors , in Indiana . Meanwhile , the Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 31 - 31 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Lakers to just 16 points in the second quarter , while also out - rebounding them 51 - 38 and out - assisting them 38 - 38 . The Lakers were also held to just 43 percent shooting from the field and 25 percent from three - point range , while the Wizards shot 49 percent from the floor and 67 percent from beyond the arc . Wall finished with 21 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 5 - 12 FT ) , 13 assists and nine rebounds , while Beal added 19 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt ) , four rebounds and two assists . Jordan Clarkson finished with 18 points , three rebounds and three assists , in 37 minutes . The only other Lakers player to reach double figures in points was Lou Williams , who finished with 14 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) in 19 minutes . Julius Randle did n't play due to an illness and did not return to the game . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the road to play the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while Los Angeles will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 82 - 73 , at FedExForum on Wednesday . The Jazz ( 18 - 10 ) have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the Western Conference playoff race . They 've now won four of their last five games , with Wednesday 's win over the Grizzlies being the most impressive of the bunch . Utah was led by a 21 - point , 12 - rebound double - double from Rudy Gobert , while Gordon Hayward added 22 points , seven rebounds , six assists , three blocks , two steals and two three - pointers of his own . Boris Diaw added 11 points , six rebounds and three assists . Rodney Hood chipped in 10 points , four rebounds and one assist . Dante Exum went scoreless over 14 minutes in his return to the starting lineup after missing the previous two games with an ankle injury . He 's now averaging 7 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists on the season . The Grizzlies ( 18 11 ) , on the other hand , have now lost two straight games . Mike Conley led the way with 14 points and four assists , but shot just 3 - of - 16 from the field and 1 - of 9 from three - point range . Marc Gasol was held to just 8 points , while Zach Randolph was the only other Memphis player to score in double figures . Randolph finished with 12 points and 11 rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . JaMychal Green added 10 points and a team - high 11 rebounds , while Tony Allen Crabbe had nine points and eight rebounds in 34 minutes . Up next , the Jazz will head to San Antonio on Friday to take on the Spurs , while the Grizzlies will stay home to play the Warriors on Friday .

The only played 30 minutes and finished with four points ( 2 - 3 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , two steals ) , in that time . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 19 points , four rebounds , two assists and three blocks , in 25 minutes . Seth Curry added 20 points and five rebounds in 34 minutes . The only other Maverick to reach double figures was Devin Harris , who scored 11 points ( 3 - 8 FG ) in 20 minutes off the bench . The Mavs shot 47 percent from the floor and 23 percent from beyond the arc , while the Knicks shot 42 percent from deep , as they could n't keep up with the Mavericks . Up next , the Knicks will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Meanwhile , the Mavericks will look to keep their winning streak alive as they travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

The Cavaliers were able to use a strong second half where they outscored the Celtics 32 - 32 to finish the game and secure the victory in front of their home crowd . LeBron James led the way for Cleveland with 30 points ( 12 - 22 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , 12 assists and seven rebounds in 36 minutes . Kevin Love followed up with 26 points and eight rebounds in 33 minutes , while Kyrie Irving added 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 3 - 8 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) and six assists in 34 minutes . Tristan Thompson chipped in 15 points and 14 rebounds in 31 minutes . The Cavs shot 49 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range , while holding the Celtics to 48 percent shooting and 34 percent from long range . The Celtics were led by Avery Bradley , who finished with a game - high 26 points ( 11 - 20 FG ) and 10 rebounds in 39 minutes . Isaiah Thomas was the only other Boston player to score in double figures , as he finished with 30 ( 8 - 19 FG , 0 - 6 3PT ) , to go along with six assists and three rebounds . Jaylen Brown added 19 points and five rebounds , while Tyler Zeller recorded a double - double with 11 points and 10 boards in 28 minutes . Marcus Smart was a nice spark off the bench with 14 points and two assists . Game 5 will take place in Boston on Friday . The series now shifts back to Cleveland for Game 7 .

Augustin added 15 points off the bench , in 25 minutes . Orlando shot 41 percent from the field and 54 percent from three - point range , while the Bucks shot 49 percent from deep . Up next , the Bucks will stay home to take on the Hawks on Friday , while Orlando will head to Chicago to play the Bulls on Friday .

The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 27 - 26 in the first quarter , but the Jazz battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Thunder were able to out - score the Jazz 30 - 23 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Joe Ingles finished with 11 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal in 38 minutes , while Derrick Favors added 14 points , five rebounds and one assist in 19 minutes . Dante Exum started at point guard in place of George Hill and finished with five points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals in 22 minutes . Next up , the Jazz will travel to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Kings will head home to play the Lakers on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 4 - 3 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 4 ) 93 - 89 on Sunday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Cavaliers were able to hold off the Warriors in the fourth quarter to win their first game of the NBA Finals , as they held on for the victory in front of their home crowd . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers with 27 points ( 9 - 24 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , 11 rebounds , 11 assists , two steals and three blocks in 47 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 26 points ( 10 - 23 FG ) , six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block in 43 minutes . J.R. Smith finished with 12 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 2 - 8 3PT ) , four rebounds , two assists and one steal in 39 minutes , while Kevin Love chipped in nine points , 14 rebounds , three assists and two steals in 30 minutes . Draymond Green was the high - point man for the Warriors , as he finished with 32 points ( 11 - 15 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) to go along with 15 rebounds and nine assists in 46 minutes . Stephen Curry finished with 17 points ( 6 - 19 FG , 4 - 14 3 Pt ) , five rebounds and two assists in 38 minutes . Klay Thompson struggled shooting , going 6 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - 10 from the three - point line to score 14 points in 42 minutes . The Warriors shot just 39 percent from the floor and 37 percent from beyond the arc . Golden State will look to bounce back in their next game on Tuesday when they take on the second night of a back - to - back when they host the Portland Trail Blazers . Cleveland , on the other hand , will travel to San Antonio on Tuesday to play the Spurs in the second game of their first round of the Finals .
The Phoenix Suns ( 15 - 14 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 19 - 7 ) 104 - 92 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C. The Suns were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after trailing by double - digits for the majority of the game , as they outscored the Wizards 29 - 21 in the final period to secure the victory . The Suns shot 51 percent from the field and 35 percent from beyond the arc , while the Wizards shot just 41 percent and 21 percent , respectively . Phoenix was led by Eric Bledsoe , who finished with 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 29 minutes . Goran Dragic added 16 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 31 minutes , while Markieff Morris chipped in 17 points , two rebounds and one assist , in 36 minutes . Isaiah Thomas was the only other player to score in double figures for the Suns , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and four rebounds , in 18 minutes off the bench . The Wizards were led by John Wall and Bradley Beal , who each finished with 14 points , eight assists , five rebounds and three steals , in 38 minutes . Paul Pierce had 12 points ( 4 - 13 FG ) and three rebounds , while Marcin Gortat had nine points ( 3 - 4 FG ) , seven rebounds and two blocked shots , in 20 minutes . Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the bench with 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) in 28 minutes . Otto Porter Jr. added 17 points and six rebounds in 32 minutes . Up next , the Suns will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams , while Washington will head to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Friday . This marks the Wizards ' third loss in a row and their fifth loss in their last six games .
The Utah Jazz ( 10 - 20 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 4 - 25 ) 88 - 71 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the 76ers 25 - 12 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Sixers never led by more than seven points in the second half . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game as well , with the Jazz recording 17 assists to 12 turnovers , while the Sixers committed 16 turnovers to just 11 assists . The 76ers were led by Robert Covington , who scored 17 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) and grabbed nine rebounds in 36 minutes . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Robert Hilario was huge off the bench , as he scored 20 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 6 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and two steals in 32 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for Philadelphia was Henry Sims , who finished with 10 points and eight rebounds . Nerlens Noel recorded a double - double with five points and 10 rebounds , while Michael Carter-Williams had eight points , six assists and four rebounds in 37 minutes . Derrick Favors led the Jazz in scoring with 17 points , while also adding 15 rebounds , three assists , three steals and five blocks in 34 minutes . Trey Burke was the only starter to reach double figures in points with 17 . He went 5 - for - 18 from the field and 1 - for 6 - of - 7 from the three - point line to score 17 points . Gordon Hayward struggled shooting , going 4 - for 15 points on 4 - of 14 shooting , but still finished with 15 points and six rebounds . The other three starters scored in double digits for the Jazz , including Enes Kanter , who chipped in 10 points , 10 rebounds and five blocked shots in 25 minutes . Alec Burks and Trey Burke each scored 14 and 17 points respectively . The Sixers ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , and the Jazz will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .

The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 32 - 29 in the first quarter , but the Nuggets battled back in the second quarter to make it a one - point game heading into halftime . However , the Spurs were able to out - score the Nuggets 33 - 23 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to pull away in the fourth quarter and secure the win . The Nuggets were led by Ty Lawson , who finished with 23 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and nine assists in 33 minutes . It was the first time he 's scored less than 20 points in a game since Feb. 12 - 14 , so it was a nice bounce back game for the veteran forward . Manu Ginobili added nine points ( 2 - 5 FG ) in 19 minutes off the bench , while also adding three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block in 16 minutes . San Antonio 's next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday .

The 76ers have now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . They 're currently in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division , and are a half game behind the eighth - seeded Atlanta Hawks . Up next , the Celtics will head home Wednesday to take on the Hawks , while the 76ers will travel to Charlotte on Wednesday to play the Hornets .

Ian Clark and Marreese Speights were the only bench players to reach double figures . Clark finished with 11 points and two assists , while Speights added 10 points and one rebound in 13 minutes . With the win , Golden State has now clinched the top seed in the Western Conference playoff race . They 'll head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Hawks will head to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Friday .

The Hawks were able to out - rebound the Cavaliers 50 - 39 and out - assist them 50 to 39 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Kevin Love finished with 24 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 4 3PT ) , 12 rebounds and three steals in 38 minutes . LeBron James finished with 23 points , nine rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block in 37 minutes . J.R. Smith struggled shooting , going 2 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - 10 from the three - point line to finish with six points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Washington Wizards , 123 - 106 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 9 - 5 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the NBA over recent weeks , as they 've won four of their last five games . Wednesday 's win over the Wizards was no exception , as the Pacers cruised to a wire - to - wire win thanks in large part to the play of All-Star forward Paul George . George scored a game - high 40 points on 14 - of - 19 shooting , to go along with eight rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 37 minutes . Indiana shot 55 percent from the field and 73 percent from three - point range , while holding the Wizards to 46 percent shooting and 39 percent from long range . C.J . Miles added 32 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 33 minutes , while Monta Ellis chipped in 10 points , five rebounds and five assists . George Hill added 14 points , four rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block , in 32 minutes . Ian Mahinmi added seven points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , in 22 minutes . On deck for the Pacers is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . The Wizards ( 6 - 4 ) have struggled mightily on offense all season , as evidenced by their 6 - 5 record . They 've now lost three straight games , with their last two losses coming by a combined 29 points . On Wednesday , Bradley Beal led the way for Washington with 20 points , while John Wall and Marcin Gortat each added 18 points and nine rebounds . Otto Porter Porter Porter , starting in place of Kris Humphries , scored just seven points on 2 - of 8 shots , in 25 minutes . Kelly Oubre , Jrue Holiday and Ramon Sessions all scored in double figures off the bench , with the former adding 11 points , seven rebounds and four assists , and the latter providing 23 points and three rebounds . Washington 's next game is on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while the Pacers will be at home against the Toronto Raptors on Saturday .

The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 31 - 23 in the first quarter and 35 - 17 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , while the Hornets shot 41 percent from beyond the arc and only 10 percent from long range . Chris Paul led the way for the Clippers with 22 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , 15 assists and five rebounds , in 38 minutes . Blake Griffin added 22 points and 16 rebounds of his own , while J.J. Redick chipped in 17 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 4 - 9 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with 11 points and 12 rebounds , along with one steal , one block and one assist , in 39 minutes . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , as he finished with 21 points and three rebounds in 26 minutes . The Hornets were led by Al Jefferson , who finished with 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , nine rebounds and two assists , in 32 minutes . Kemba Walker finished with 15 points , five rebounds and six assists , while Marco Belinelli added 17 points and one rebound , in 29 minutes . Lance Stephenson was held to just three points ( 1 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 - 1 3PT ) , while Gerald Henderson had eight points ( 3 - 11 FG ) and three assists . Next up for the Hornets is a matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , in which they 'll hope to get their first win of the season . Meanwhile , the Clippers will look to build off this win when they take on the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday . This was the second game of a back - to - back , as the Clippers ' next game will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Phoenix Suns , 117 - 87 , at Target Center on Wednesday . The Timberwolves ( 13 - 29 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to battle for the eight - seed in the Western Conference . Minnesota has now won four of its last five games , with Wednesday 's win over the Suns serving as the most lopsided of that stretch . Minnesota shot 56 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while holding Phoenix to just 43 percent shooting and 20 percent from beyond the arc . Ricky Rubio was the high - point man for the Timberwolves , with 18 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with three assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 24 minutes . Andrew Wiggins added 18 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 28 minutes , while Karl-Anthony Towns chipped in 14 points , eight rebounds , three blocks and one assist , in 26 minutes . Shabazz Muhammad Ridnour added 15 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) and six rebounds , in 18 minutes off the bench , while Gorgui Dieng added 11 points , three rebounds , four steals and one block , in 23 minutes . Brandon Knight led the way for the Suns with 20 points , in 39 minutes . Markieff Morris added 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and five rebounds , while Devin Booker finished with 11 points . The only other player to score in double digits for Phoenix was P.J . Tucker , who finished with four points , seven rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 29 minutes . Up next , the Timberwolves will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Suns will head to Los Angeles to play the Lakers on Friday . The Suns will look to bounce back , in their next game , when they play the Clippers on Friday in Los Angeles .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 15 - 6 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 2 - 19 ) 95 - 79 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the 76ers 25 - 21 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Sixers to just 42 percent shooting from the field and 24 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 52 - 39 and out - assisting them 26 - 21 . The 76ers were led by Michael Carter-Williams , who recorded a double - double with eight points ( 4 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and 10 rebounds , along with nine assists and two blocked shots , in 38 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Luc Mbah a Moute was the only other starter to score in double figures , as he finished with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) and five steals , in 29 minutes . The only other Philadelphia player to reach double figures in points was Jahlil Okafor , who finished with 13 points and seven rebounds , in 16 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Hawks will look to keep their winning streak alive , as they play the second game of a back - to - back when they host the Hornets on Friday . The Sixers will head home to take on the Nets on Friday , in what could be a potential playoff preview .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 12 - 12 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 16 - 7 ) 111 - 106 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Bucks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 26 - 14 in the first quarter and 39 - 21 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the Clippers to just 14 points in the third quarter , while also out - rebounding them 39 - 35 , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Clippers were led by Matt Barnes , who finished with 26 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 6 - 8 3Pt ) and two steals in 32 minutes . J.J. Redick added 25 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 5 - 7 3PT , 8 - 8 FT ) , five rebounds and three assists in 35 minutes . Chris Paul struggled shooting the ball , going 5 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - of - 4 from the three - point line , but still finished with 10 points , seven assists and five rebounds in 36 minutes . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with seven points ( 3 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and 15 rebounds in 39 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with 20 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) of his own , to go along with five rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 31 minutes . Brandon Knight was the other starter to score in double figures , finishing with 22 points , five assists and four rebounds , in 30 minutes . Larry Sanders finished with 15 points ( 7 - 9 FG ) , nine rebounds , two blocked shots and one assist , in 28 minutes . Jabari Parker chipped in with 12 points and five boards , while Mirza Teletovic finished with 11 points and seven rebounds in 27 minutes off the bench , in his second game back after missing two games with an ankle injury . The only other Bucks player to reach double figures in points was Greg Monroe , who scored 14 points and grabbed six rebounds in 22 minutes . Next up , the Clippers will head home to take on the Orlando Magic on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 29 - 29 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 18 - 40 ) 128 - 121 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 24 - 25 in the first quarter and 28 - 28 in the second quarter , but the Suns battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth . However , the Bulls out - scored the Suns 28 - 29 in the fourth quarter to seal the win . The Suns were led by Devin Booker , who scored a game - high 27 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 41 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists on the season . Eric Bledsoe was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Suns , as he finished with 17 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal , in 40 minutes . T.J. Warren chipped in 17 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds , while Marquese Chriss added 17 points and seven rebounds , in 33 minutes . Jimmy Butler and Dwyane Wade led the way for the Bulls , with 22 points each . Wade went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for 1 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding four rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocked shots . Butler added nine assists and four steals , while Robin Lopez added 19 points and six rebounds . Nikola Mirotic came off the bench to score 20 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 7 3PT and 6 - 7 FT ) with eight rebounds and two assists , in 37 minutes . Bobby Portis started in place of Rajon Rondo , who sat this one out with an illness , and finished with nine points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and seven boards , in 16 minutes . Pau Gasol added 15 points , five rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block , in 34 minutes . The only other Bulls player to reach double figures in points was Doug McDermott , who finished with six points ( 3 - 5 FG ) in 29 minutes . With this win the Bulls are now 2 - 1 in their last three games , while the Suns are now 3 - 2 over their last five games . Up next , the Suns will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams , as they 'll look to snap a three - game losing streak , as the Bulls will travel to Indiana to play the Pacers on Friday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 27 - 12 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 12 - 27 ) 101 - 96 on Monday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 32 - 21 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Timberwolves never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who finished with 22 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , five rebounds and two assists in 35 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 22 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists . Ricky Rubio struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 5 from the field and 1 - of - 5 for three points in 21 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Timberwolves was Shabazz Muhammad in 27 minutes off the bench , as he finished with 21 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) with nine rebounds and four assists . Kevin Durant led the Thunder in scoring with 30 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 2 - 9 3PT ) , along with seven rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Russell Westbrook recorded his third triple - double of the season , finishing the game with 22 , 11 assists , seven rebounds and three steals , in 33 minutes , while Kevin Durant added 18 points and four rebounds , in 20 minutes . Serge Ibaka added eight points ( 3 - 8 FG ) and eight rebounds , while Steven Adams chipped in eight points and five rebounds in 28 minutes . Kevin Garnett was held scoreless in nine minutes before fouling out in the fourth quarter , in his second game back from a knee injury . Next up for the Thunder is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday . For the Timberwolves , they 'll look to get back on the right track , as they play host to the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday .

The Raptors were able to make a run in the third quarter , however , as they out - scored the Hornets 28 - 14 , but Kemba Walker and Gerald Henderson answered back with a pair of three - pointers to give the Hornets the lead for good in the fourth quarter . Charlotte was able to hold on to their lead for the rest of the way , as the Raptors could n't close out the Hornets in the final minutes . Gerald Henderson led all scorers with 31 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and three assists , in 38 minutes , while Walker followed up with 29 points ( 12 - 25 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and eight assists in 41 minutes . Cory Joseph led the bench in scoring with 15 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) to go with five assists , four rebounds and four steals , in 28 minutes . Up next , the Hornets will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while the Raptors will stay home and play the Nuggets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 116 - 112 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Cavaliers ( 14 - 5 ) came into Wednesday 's contest looking to extend their winning streak to five games , and they did just that with a big road win over the Raptors . LeBron James led the way for Cleveland with 34 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and two steals , while Kevin Love posted a 28 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of steals and a block . Kyrie Irving was next with 24 points , while J.R. Smith and Tristan Thompson supplied matching six - point efforts , with the former also hauling in 14 boards . The Cavs shot 48 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while holding Toronto to just 43 percent shooting overall and 41 percent from long range . DeMar DeRozan 's 31 points led Toronto , and he supplemented the total with five assists , four rebounds and three steals . Kyle Lowry was right behind him with a 24 - point tally that he supplemented with nine assists , three rebounds and a steal . Jonas Valanciunas mustered a modest four points but hauled in 10 rebounds and dished out an assist . Terrence Ross led the second unit with 14 points , and Cory Joseph was productive in a reserve role as well with 12 points and nine rebounds over 30 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home Friday to take on the Pacers , while the Raptors will head to Boston on Friday to play the Celtics .

McCollum carried the load for the Trail Blazers , as they each scored a team - high of 27 points each . The Pistons ( 32 - 31 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to climb up the Eastern Conference standings . Andre Drummond added 14 points and 18 rebounds , in 27 minutes , while Tobias Harris chipped in 16 points , five assists , five rebounds and three steals . Marcus Morris added 19 points , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 16 points and seven rebounds . As a team , the Pistons shot 52 percent from the field and 55 percent from three - point range , while the Trail Blazers shot 45 percent and 36 percent , respectively . Damian Lillard led the Blazers ( 33 - 30 ) in scoring , with 26 points , along with five assists and five rebounds . C.J . McCollum added 22 points , two rebounds and five assists . Al-Farouq Aminu finished second on the team , with 16 points . The San Antonio Spurs ( 6 - 3 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 4 - 5 ) 96 - 86 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 28 - 26 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Pistons to just 15 points in the second quarter , while also out - rebounding them 45 - 42 and out - assisting them 45 to 42 . The Pistons were led by Andre Drummond , who recorded a double - double with 20 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and 17 rebounds in 33 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 17 times , converting on 11 of those attempts . He 's now averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds on the season . The only other Piston to reach double figures in points was Tobias Harris , who finished with 12 points ( 4 of 13 FG , 0 - 4 3Pts , 4 of 4 FT ) , five rebounds and two assists in 31 minutes . Ish Smith and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope were the only other Pistons to score in double figures with 12 and 10 points , respectively , but it was n't enough to keep up with the Spurs , who shot 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from beyond the arc . Pau Gasol led the way for the Spurs with 21 points ( 10 - 16 FG ) , nine rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal in 36 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Gasol , while LaMarcus Aldridge finished with 14 points ( 6 of 14 FG , 2 of 2 FT ) of his own , to go along with 12 rebounds and one assist in 37 minutes . Kawhi Leonard chipped in 17 points ( 5 of 18 FG , 4 for 5 3PT , 3 for 3PT ) , four rebounds , one assist and four steals as well . Tony Parker struggled shooting the ball , going 3 of 11 from the floor and 0 of 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to finish with seven points , four assists and two rebounds in 21 minutes . Manu Ginobili added 10 points ( 3 of 7 FG ) and four assists in 26 minutes off the bench , while Patty Mills had 10 points in 16 minutes . With the win , the Spurs are now 3 - 1 at home this season and will look to keep it going as they play host to the Golden State Warriors on Friday . Meanwhile , the Pistons will head to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder on Friday , where they 'll look to get back on track .

Barea finished with 15 points and seven assists , while Dirk Nowitzki added 16 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Bucks were able to make a run in the fourth quarter though , as they out - scored the Celtics 29 - 21 , but it was too little too late . Both teams play on Wednesday , as the Celtics host the New York Knicks , while the Bucks host the Los Angeles Clippers .

He was able to get to the free throw line at will , converting on 13 - of - 18 attempts from the charity stripe . Danny Green added 11 points and six rebounds , while Manu Ginobili chipped in 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , six rebounds and three assists , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Clippers were led by Blake Griffin , who finished with 14 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) , 10 rebounds , five assists and one block , in 32 minutes . DeAndre Jordan added 10 points and eight rebounds , in 30 minutes . Chris Paul struggled shooting , as he went 3 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for 4 from the three - point line , to finish with seven points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 33 minutes . The only other Clipper to reach double figures in points was Jamal Crawford , who scored 11 points ( 4 - 4 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , one assist and one steal , in 22 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will stay home to take on Friday against the Grizzlies , while the Clippers will head home to play the Warriors on Friday .
The Miami Heat ( 24 - 31 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 12 - 44 ) 119 - 108 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 32 - 31 in the first quarter and 29 - 19 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , as they shot 55 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range , while holding the Sixers to 48 percent shooting and 42 percent from long range . Luol Deng led the Heat in scoring with 29 points ( 11 - 14 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds and two assists , in 33 minutes . Goran Dragic added a double - double with 23 points and 10 assists , while Hassan Whiteside added 12 points and 14 rebounds in 28 minutes . Dwyane Wade chipped in 18 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) , four assists and three rebounds , in 23 minutes , while Tyler Johnson added 11 points and one rebound , in 21 minutes off the bench . The 76ers were led by Nerlens Noel , who finished with 18 points , seven rebounds , two assists and four blocks , in 31 minutes . Robert Covington added 16 points , four rebounds and five steals , in 34 minutes . Dario Saric led the way for the 76ers , with 22 points ( 6 - 9 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and one assist , in 27 minutes off of the bench , while Henry Sims finished with 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG ) , three assists and one block , in 18 minutes . Up next , the Heat will stay home to take on Friday against the Wizards , while the Sixers will head home to play the Nets on Friday . The Sixers will look to end their losing streak on Friday in Brooklyn .

The Bucks were able to make a run in the fourth quarter though , as they out - scored the Celtics 29 - 21 , but it was too little too late . Both teams play on Wednesday , as the Celtics host the New York Knicks , while the Bucks host the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Golden State Warriors ( 16 - 2 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 8 - 9 ) 112 - 85 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 22 - 12 in the first quarter and 31 - 12 the rest of the way . They were able to coast to a comfortable victory , as they shot 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pelicans to just 42 percent shooting from the floor and 20 percent from beyond the arc . Draymond Green finished with 14 points and 14 rebounds , while Andrew Bogut added eight points and 11 rebounds in 29 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 30 points ( 14 - 19 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) , 15 rebounds and three blocked shots in 38 minutes . Up next , the Warriors will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while the Pelicans will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Orlando Magic , 121 - 113 - 113 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . The Nuggets ( 9 - 15 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the NBA over recent weeks , as they 've now won four of their last five games . Denver 's offense was firing on all cylinders Wednesday , as the team shot 57 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range en route to an easy win . Shooting guard Danilo Gallinari led the team with 21 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , while forward Jusuf Nurkic scored 17 points and pulled down eight rebounds . Center Nikola Jokic , meanwhile , scored a team - high 19 points to go along with 10 rebounds in just 24 minutes off the bench . For the Magic ( 10 - 14 ) , the loss snapped a three - game winning streak . The team was led by a 24 - point , six - assist double - double from Evan Fournier , who also had four rebounds and six assists . Serge Ibaka followed up with 22 points , four rebounds , and four blocks . Bismack Biyombo had 12 points , six rebounds , four assists , and one steal . D.J . Augustin filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , seven assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Aaron Gordon and Nikola Vucevic were the only other Magic players to score in double figures , with 11 and 17 points , respectively . Orlando shot a respectable 49 percent as a team but could n't keep up with the Nuggets ' high - powered offense . Up next , the Nuggets will travel to Miami on Friday to take on the second night of a back - to - back . The Magic will be in Charlotte on Friday for a date with the Hornets .
