The Miami Heat defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 97 - 95 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Wednesday . The Heat ( 11 - 6 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the entirety of the second half , as they held the lead for the majority of the game . The key for Miami was their defense , as the Thunder never led by more than seven points in the first half and never got within 10 points after that . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Heat recording 25 assists to nine turnovers , while the Thunder committed 15 turnovers to 15 assists . Miami also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 35 - 35 . The Thunder ( 11 7 ) have now lost four of their last five games , as this was easily their worst loss of the season . Kevin Durant led the way for Oklahoma City , as he tallied 25 points , nine rebounds and six assists . Russell Westbrook finished second on the team , totaling 25 points and five rebounds . Enes Kanter came off the bench to provide 13 points , three rebounds and two assists . The only other player to score in double digits for the Thunder was Dion Waiters , who finished with 10 points and three rebounds in 21 minutes . Oklahoma City will look to get out of this slide on Friday , when they host the Orlando Magic for their next game . Miami was led by Dwyane Wade , who scored a game - high 28 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Goran Dragic finished with 14 points and seven assists . Chris Bosh and Hassan Whiteside each recorded 16 points and eight rebounds , while Tyler Johnson chipped in 12 points of his own . Miami 's next game will be on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans .

The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Rockets 36 - 22 in the first quarter , but the Rockets battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Nuggets were able to out - score the Rockets 26 - 24 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Rockets were led by James Harden , who finished with 24 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 3 FT ) , six assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 34 minutes . Trevor Ariza followed up with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 9 3PT ) , five rebounds and four assists , in 42 minutes . Dwight Howard finished with 13 points and eight rebounds , in 33 minutes , while Patrick Beverley chipped in 14 points , eight assists and one rebound , in 35 minutes . Eric Gordon came off the bench to score 19 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) in 22 minutes . Gary Harris led the way for the Nuggets , with 21 points ( 8 - 11 shooting ) , two rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks , in 40 minutes . Joffrey Lauvergne recorded a double - double with 14 points and 11 rebounds , along with one assist and one steal , in 21 minutes . Kenneth Faried finished with 11 points and nine rebounds , while Jameer Nelson added 10 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Nikola Jokic added 23 points , nine boards , three steals and three blocked shots , in 32 minutes off the pine , while Will Barton added nine points and seven rebounds . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Danilo Gallinari , who added 15 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Denver shot 51 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while the Rockets shot 47 percent from beyond the arc and 45 percent from long range . Next up , the Rockets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second of a back - to - back for both teams . Denver will be right back in action Friday , as they play host to the Trail Blazers .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 17 - 7 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 15 - 9 ) 93 - 86 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 28 - 22 in the first quarter , but the Bulls battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Hawks out - scored the Bulls 20 - 20 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Al Horford led the Hawks in scoring with 21 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , six assists and two steals , in 33 minutes . Paul Millsap followed up with 17 points ( 6 - 16 FG ) , eight rebounds , two assists and four steals , while Jeff Teague chipped in 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) and seven assists , in 35 minutes . The Bulls were led by Jimmy Butler , who went 8 - for 17 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 22 points , along with nine rebounds , in 38 minutes . Taj Gibson finished with 15 points and 17 rebounds , while Derrick Rose added 14 points , eight assists , five rebounds and one block , in 32 minutes . Pau Gasol finished with 13 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and three blocks , in 40 minutes , while Mike Dunleavy added 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) and six rebounds in 39 minutes . Next up , the Bulls play the second game of a back - to back , when they host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Atlanta plays host to the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , in what will be the second of a home - and - home set .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 25 - 6 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 14 - 16 ) 119 - 100 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 36 - 25 in the first quarter and 32 - 24 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 56 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while holding the Bulls to just 45 percent shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs , scoring a game - high 33 points ( 15 - 20 FG , 3 - 6 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and one assist , in 38 minutes . Kawhi Leonard followed up with 25 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , 10 rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Tony Parker chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) , seven assists and three rebounds , in 28 minutes . Pau Gasol finished with 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and seven rebounds , while Manu Ginobili added nine points ( 4 - 5 FG ) in 16 minutes off the bench . The Bulls were led by Dwyane Wade , who finished with 24 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and six assists , in 27 minutes . Jimmy Butler was the only other Bull to score in double figures , as he finished with 19 points ( 8 - 19 FG ) . Rajon Rondo struggled shooting , going 3 - for - 7 from the floor and 0 - 1 from three point guard , finishing with six points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 30 minutes . Taj Gibson and Robin Lopez were the only two Bulls to score double digits , with 12 and 10 points respectively , in 25 and 19 minutes . Next up , the Bulls play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the Houston Rockets on Friday . San Antonio plays host to the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , in what will be the second of a four - game road trip .
The Utah Jazz ( 5 - 3 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 6 ) 109 - 84 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 30 - 24 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the entirety of the second half , as the 76ers were n't able to get anything going offensively . Utah shot 51 percent from the field and 58 percent from three - point range , while holding the Sixers to 40 percent shooting and 33 percent from long range . Gordon Hayward led the Jazz in scoring with 20 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and five assists , in 30 minutes . Rodney Hood followed up with 18 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 4 - 5 3PT ) , two rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 29 minutes . Derrick Favors recorded a double - double with 16 points and 14 rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 28 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Jazz was Joe Ingles , who chipped in 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 0 ) , in 20 minutes off the bench . For the Sixers , Joel Embiid led the way with 14 points and nine rebounds , in 19 minutes . Robert Covington finished with 12 points and eight rebounds , while Jahlil Okafor added 15 points , in 22 minutes . Dario Saric played just 23 minutes , and finished with four points and two assists . The 76ers will look to get out of this slide on Friday when they take on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans . Utah 's next game will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while the Sixers will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 19 - 28 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 33 - 16 ) 102 - 100 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 22 - 14 in the first quarter and 32 - 16 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the Clippers to just 14 points in the third quarter , while also out - rebounding them 52 - 45 . The Clippers were able , however , to out - score the Nets 36 - 32 in the fourth quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . The Clips were led by DeAndre Jordan , who recorded a double - double with 22 points ( 10 - 13 FG , 2 - 12 FT ) and 20 rebounds . He also added eight assists and a game - high of 20 points in 37 minutes . Chris Paul was the only other Clipper to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 20 points ( 8 - 18 FG ) , eight rebounds and eight assists of his own . Blake Griffin finished with 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) , six rebounds and seven assists , while Jamal Crawford chipped in 18 points ( 7 - 22 FG ) and five rebounds off the bench . The only other player to score in double figures for the Clippers was Matt Barnes , who finished with 12 points ( 5 - 10 ) . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Clips , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . The Kings won the season series with the Nets 2 - 1 . Brook Lopez was the high - point man in this game , with 24 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 0 - 1 3Pts ) , seven rebounds and one steal . Joe Johnson led the Nets in scoring with 22 , while adding five rebounds and six assists . Kevin Garnett had a quiet game by his standards , but still managed six points ( 3 - 7 FG , 3 - 10 FT ) but did haul in 11 rebounds and recorded an assist and a steal . Jarrett Jack had a solid game as well , finishing with seven rebounds , seven assists and two steals in 40 minutes . Quincy Acy and Caris LeVert were the only two Nets players to score more than 15 points , with the former adding three rebounds and three assists , and the latter adding three assists and three steals in 29 minutes of action . Both teams play on Friday , as the Nets will travel to Washington to take on the Wizards , while the Clippers will head to Philadelphia to play the 76ers .

The Los Angeles Clippers ( 41 - 23 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 14 - 48 ) 89 - 76 on Monday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 25 - 25 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to coast to the victory , as they held the Timberwolves to 37 percent shooting from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while also out - rebounding them 42 - 42 . J.J. Redick led the way for the Clippers , scoring a game - high 26 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) , to go along with five rebounds and five assists , in 39 minutes . DeAndre Jordan was the only other Clipper to score in double figures , as he finished with 20 points and 17 rebounds , while adding three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 38 minutes . Chris Paul struggled shooting , going just 1 - for - 6 from the floor , but still finished with 15 assists and four rebounds , in 30 minutes . Jamal Crawford chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , six assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Timberwolves were led by the duo of Adreian Payne and Nikola Pekovic . Payne finished with 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and 15 rebounds , along with two assists and two blocked shots , in 37 minutes . He 's now recorded two double - doubles in his last three games , after doing so in each of his last two , as the Timberwolves ' starting point guard . The other two starters , Kevin Martin and Andrew Wiggins , finished with 11 and 12 points , respectively . Ricky Rubio struggled shooting the ball , going only 1 - of - 8 from beyond the arc and scoring only two points , but did dish out 12 assists , while grabbing two rebounds and recording three steals . He did turn the ball over three times , so it was n't all good for the Wolves . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Nik Stauskas , who finished with six points and 10 rebounds in 27 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will head home to play the Lakers on Wednesday .

Next up , the Warriors will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back . Houston , on the other hand , will look to end their three - game losing streak when they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .

Meanwhile , Toronto will head home to face the Nuggets on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 106 - 82 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Wednesday . The Heat ( 19 - 13 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . In fact , Miami held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes , as they held the Mavs to just 36 percent shooting from the field and 23 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Heat recording 24 assists to just 12 turnovers , while the Mavericks committed 22 turnovers to just nine assists . Hassan Whiteside was the player of the game , as he led the Heat with 25 points and 19 rebounds on 12 - of - 16 shooting . Chris Bosh finished with 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists , while Goran Dragic chipped in 15 points , four rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Tyler Johnson and Wayne Ellington were the only other Heat players to score in double figures , with Johnson scoring eight points and adding three rebounds and two assists , and Elledton scoring 19 points and grabbing three rebounds off the bench . Zaza Pachulia led the Mavericks in scoring with 14 points and 13 rebounds , while Dirk Nowitzki added 11 points , three rebounds , an assist and a steal . Wesley Matthews finished with 12 points and four rebounds . Chandler Parsons and J.J. Barea combined for just nine points , five assists and five turnovers . The Mavericks will look to bounce back on Friday , when they host the Orlando Magic for their next game . Miami , meanwhile , will be in action again on Friday in a home matchup against the Atlanta Hawks .

The Pelicans came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they took a 30 - 23 lead after the first quarter and never looked back , as they never relinquished the lead after that . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 9 - 13 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 13 - 8 ) 103 - 94 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 29 - 18 in the first quarter and 31 - 19 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , as they shot 44 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range , while holding the Cavaliers to 37 percent shooting from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . Russell Westbrook led the Thunder in scoring with 26 points ( 12 - 24 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and eight assists , in 36 minutes . Kevin Durant followed up with 19 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) and six rebounds , in 30 minutes . Enes Kanter chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , four rebounds and three assists in 26 minutes off the bench , while Reggie Jackson added 11 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Cavaliers were led by Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving , who each finished with 18 points and 20 points , respectively . Love added 16 rebounds and two assists , while Irving added six assists and three rebounds . Matthew Dellavedova added 14 points , five rebounds and four assists . The only other player to score in double digits for Cleveland was Channing Frye Frye , who finished with 14 points and 13 rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 29 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Friday .
The Miami Heat ( 48 - 33 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 43 - 38 ) 99 - 93 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 31 - 17 in the first quarter and out - rebounding them 39 - 39 in the second quarter . They were able to hold on to the lead for the rest of the game , as the Pistons were n't able to keep up . Miami shot 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pistons to 41 percent shooting and 28 percent from long range . Joe Johnson led the Heat in scoring with 25 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , to go along with five assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 34 minutes . Luol Deng finished with 17 points and 10 rebounds , while Goran Dragic added 16 points , five rebounds and four assists , in 26 minutes . Hassan Whiteside finished with 14 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) and nine rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 33 minutes . Dwyane Wade chipped in 14 points , four rebounds and three assists , while Tyler Johnson added three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 37 minutes off the bench . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the way for the Pistons , with a team - high of 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , two 3Pts , 1 - 5 FT ) . Tobias Harris finished with 16 points ( 5 - 16 FG ) , and four rebounds , in 36 minutes , while Marcus Morris added a double - double of 16 points and nine boards . Andre Drummond finished with nine points , 18 rebounds , two steals and one blocked shot , in 32 minutes . The Pistons have now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . They 're currently in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are a half - game behind the eighth - seeded Atlanta Hawks . They head to Indiana to take on the Pacers on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Heat are in third place , and currently hold the tie - breaker over the Pacers for the eighth and final playoff spot in the East .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 32 - 12 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 14 - 33 ) 115 - 93 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 23 - 23 in the first quarter and 32 - 21 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Suns were n't able to keep up . The Cavs shot 56 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while the Suns shot 47 percent of their shots from the floor and 40 percent from beyond the arc . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , finishing with 21 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , nine assists and three rebounds in 31 minutes . Kevin Love finished with a double - double of 21 points and 11 rebounds , while J.R. Smith added 18 points and four assists in 23 minutes . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Channing Frye , who chipped in 14 points ( 4 - 4 FG , 2 - 2 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) in just 23 minutes off the bench . The Suns were led by Devin Booker and P.J . Tucker , who each finished with 16 points and 13 points , respectively . Archie Goodwin added 12 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) , five assists , two rebounds and two steals , while Alex Len had four points ( 2 - 9 FG ) and four rebounds in 27 minutes . Tyson Chandler had six points and seven rebounds in 34 minutes , as he was dealing with a sore left knee . Up next , the Suns will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday . Cleveland , on the other hand , will look to extend their winning streak to 10 games on Friday , as they play host to the Bulls .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 19 - 7 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 14 - 16 ) 91 - 84 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 31 - 24 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Knicks to just 39 percent shooting from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 48 - 44 . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , scoring 24 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and five assists , in 38 minutes . Kevin Love added 23 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) and 13 rebounds , in 34 minutes , while Kyrie Irving struggled shooting , going 1 - for - 7 from the floor and 0 - 1 from beyond the arc , to finish with five points , in 19 minutes . Tristan Thompson chipped in 10 points and 14 rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . The Knicks were led by Kristaps Porzingis , who recorded a double - double with 23 points and 13 boards , along with four assists , one steal and one block , in 37 minutes . Arron Afflalo finished with 16 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Jose Calderon added 10 points , six assists and three rebounds , while Lance Thomas had eight points ( 4 - 11 FG ) , four rebounds and three assists . The only other player to score in double digits for the Knicks was Lance Thomas , who finished with 11 points in 21 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will head home to take on the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Cavaliers will head to Chicago to play the Bulls on Friday . The Cavs will look to keep their winning streak alive , as they play host to the Bulls .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 48 - 21 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 44 - 26 ) 112 - 101 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 25 - 18 in the first quarter and 39 - 19 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Mavericks were n't able to keep up with the fast - paced Grizzlies . Memphis shot 53 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while the Mavericks shot 45 percent from beyond the arc and 36 percent from long range . Zach Randolph led the way for the Grizzlies , finishing with 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds and five assists , in 34 minutes . Marc Gasol recorded a double - double with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 10 rebounds , along with two assists , one steal and one block , in 25 minutes . Mike Conley finished with 14 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) of his own , while Tony Allen chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) , seven rebounds , one assist and two steals , in 32 minutes . Vince Carter was the only other Memphis player to score in double figures , as he finished with 11 points , three assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki , who finished with 16 points and six rebounds , in 30 minutes . He 's shot just 4 - of 14 - of - 14 from the floor , including 1 - of 2 - for - 2 from three point range and 7 - of 8 for 8 from the free throw line . J.J. Barea was the high - point man for the Mavericks , with 16 , in 21 minutes . Rajon Rondo finished with 10 points , five rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks , in 29 minutes , while Monta Ellis added 12 points and two assists . Chandler Parsons finished with 12 points , while Tyson Chandler added nine points , 13 rebounds , three blocked shots and one assist , in 35 minutes . Next up , the Grizzlies will head to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back . Meanwhile , the Mavericks will be in Houston on Friday to play the Rockets , in their final game of the season .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 19 - 13 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 21 - 8 ) 110 - 106 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 28 - 22 in the first quarter and 29 - 22 the rest of the way . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Rockets never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Rockets were led by James Harden , who finished with 28 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , five assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 36 minutes . Dwight Howard finished with 24 points ( 11 - 13 FG , 2 - 7 FT ) and 17 rebounds , in 38 minutes , while Eric Gordon chipped in 25 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 6 - 8 3PT ) , in 24 minutes off the bench . Tim Duncan finished with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) , eight rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocked shots , in 31 minutes . Danny Green led the Spurs in scoring , as he went 6 - for 13 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding four rebounds and five steals . Cory Joseph finished with 14 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Manu Ginobili was the only other Spur in double figures , with 15 points , five rebounds and four assists , in 23 minutes . San Antonio shot 47 percent from the floor and 37 percent from long range , while holding the Rockets to 49 percent shooting . Up next , the Rockets will head home Friday to take on the second night of a back - to - back , while the Spurs will stay home Friday and play the Grizzlies . The Grizzlies will also be at home Friday , in what will be the second game of a home - and - against - home set .
The Washington Wizards ( 38 - 28 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 22 - 43 ) 113 - 97 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C. The Wizards were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after trailing by as many as 20 points in the first half . They outscored the Kings 38 - 12 in the final period to seal the win . The Wizards shot 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Kings shot 46 percent and 32 percent , respectively . The Kings were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who scored a game - high 30 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 12 - 16 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and five assists , in 30 minutes . Ray McCallum added 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and six assists , while Rudy Gay chipped in 15 points of his own , in 34 minutes off the bench . John Wall led the way for the Wizards , with 31 points and 12 assists , along with two rebounds and one block , in 39 minutes . Bradley Beal added 14 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) seven assists and five rebounds , while Paul Pierce added 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) and three rebounds , in 23 minutes . Marcin Gortat finished with 13 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) , five rebounds and two assists , and Kelly Oubre , Jr. added 14 , five points and five boards , in 27 minutes . Otto Porter Jr. was the only other Wizards player to score in double figures , as he chipped 10 points (5 - 5 FG ) . The win gives the Wizards a two - game lead over the eighth - place Pelicans in the Eastern Conference standings . The loss puts the Kings in a tie for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference , with the Nets , but the Wizards hold the tiebreaker over the Kings . Up next , the Wizards will head home Friday to take on the Hornets , while Sacramento will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .

The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 33 - 23 in the first quarter and 39 - 24 in the second quarter . The Trail Blazers were able to make a run in the third quarter , but the Spurs responded with a 39 - point run of their own to put the game out of reach . Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum were the only Trail Blazers to score in double figures , with Lillard finishing with 23 points and 26 points , in 40 minutes . The Blazers shot 44 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range , while the Spurs shot 52 percent ( 50 percent ) from the floor and 50 percent from beyond the arc , in the game . Portland has now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Next up , the Spurs will travel to Oklahoma City on Friday to take on the Thunder , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . Portland will look to get back on track as they play host to the Clippers on Friday , in their next game .

The Wizards were able to hold off the Hornets in this one , as they held them to just 22 points in the fourth quarter , while also outscoring them 38 - 22 in the final 12 minutes . The Atlanta Hawks ( 8 - 2 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 2 - 8 ) 93 - 90 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Hawks were able to hold off the Heat in this one , as they out - scored them 23 - 23 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Heat came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run by the Hawks to pull out the win . The key for Atlanta was their defense , as the Heat were held to 40 percent shooting from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks shot 46 percent and 35 percent , respectively . Dennis Schroder was the player of the game , as he led the Hawks with 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) and four assists in 33 minutes . Paul Millsap was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 15 points and six rebounds in 35 minutes . Dwight Howard recorded an 11 - point , 11 - rebound double - double , while Kent Bazemore finished with 12 points , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks in 31 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Hawks was Tim Hardaway , Jr. , who finished with 14 points and five rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench . Hassan Whiteside was the star of the show for the Heat . He went 6 - for - 15 from the floor and 7 - for 8 from the free throw line to finish with 19 points and 25 rebounds in 38 minutes . Josh Richardson was second on the team in scoring , with his 19 points , four rebounds , three blocked shots and two assists . Dion Waiters finished with 11 points , two assists , three steals and one block in 34 minutes . Wayne Ellington chipped in 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) , two rebounds and two blocked shots in 32 minutes , while James Johnson added 13 points and four rebounds in 26 minutes . Up next , the Hawks will look to keep their winning streak alive against the Orlando Magic on Friday , while Miami will head home to take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .

The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 35 - 14 in the first quarter and 35 - 21 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Nets were n't able to keep up with the Pelicans ' 55 percent shooting from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . Luke Babbitt led the Pelicans in scoring with 21 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , to go along with four assists , one rebound and one block , in 33 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 19 points and 5 assists per game . Jordan Hamilton also had a solid showing , as he finished with 13 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) , 11 rebounds and three assists , in 34 minutes . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Terrence Jones , who finished with 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG ) , 13 assists and three steals , in 37 minutes off the bench . Dante Cunningham added 14 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 32 minutes , while E'Twaun Moore chipped in 16 points , six rebounds , four blocks and one assist , in 29 minutes . Thomas Robinson recorded his second double - double of the season , with 11 points and 15 rebounds , in 27 minutes . Brook Lopez was the only other than Robinson to score in double figures , with 15 points and three rebounds . The Nets were missing Brook Lopez Lopez , who sat this one out with an ankle injury , while also missing the last game with a sprained ankle . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson started in Lopez 's place and finished with eight points , two rebounds and two blocks , in 19 minutes . With Lopez out , the Nets turned to Henry Sims and Caris LeVert to fill in as the starting center . Sims finished with 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal , while LeVert added 12 points and seven rebounds . Shane Larkin had a rough night shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 12 from the floor and 0 - for 2 - of - 2 from three point range , but still finished with six points , nine assists and four rebounds . Next up , the Pelicans will head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Friday , while the Nets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Friday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 125 - 94 , in Game 4 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Verizon Center . The Wizards ( 4 - 0 ) were expected to win this game easily , but the Raptors ( 0 - 4 ) had other ideas . In fact , Washington outscored Toronto by a 36 - 22 margin in the first quarter and never relinquished the lead after that . Shooting was key for the Wizards , as they shot 55 percent from the field and 58 percent from three - point range , while holding the Raptors to just 44 percent shooting and 28 percent from long range . The Raptors were led by Kyle Lowry , who tallied 21 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Jonas Valanciunas finished with 16 points and nine rebounds . DeMar DeRozan accrued 14 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Cory Joseph led the bench with 14 points and one rebound . Bradley Beal led the Wizards in scoring , as he dropped 23 points on 5 - of - 15 shooting . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , totaling 21 points and 11 rebounds . John Wall recorded a 14 - point , 10 - assist triple - double . Paul Pierce and Nene Hilario were the only other Wizards to score in double figures , totaling 14 and 10 points , respectively . Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the second unit with 15 points , two rebounds and three assists . Game 5 will take place on Monday in Washington .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 30 - 33 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 26 - 39 ) 104 - 93 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with 32 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 10 - 13 FT ) , 13 rebounds , seven assists , four steals and two blocks in 41 minutes . Khris Middleton followed up with 18 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 4 - 6 3PT ) and four assists in 28 minutes , while Greg Monroe chipped in 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 5 - 7 FT ) and eight rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . The Bucks shot 43 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , while the Knicks shot 46 percent and 33 percent , respectively . The Knicks were led by Derrick Rose , who finished with 26 points ( 13 - 16 FG ) and six assists in 39 minutes . Carmelo Anthony finished with 16 points and four rebounds in 40 minutes . Willy Hernangomez added 13 points and 12 rebounds , while Kristaps Porzingis had 13 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) of his own , to go along with eight rebounds , three blocks and two assists in 37 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Knicks was Courtney Lee , who added 12 points , seven rebounds and five assists in 36 minutes . Up next , the Bucks will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while New York will travel to Chicago on Friday to play the Bulls .
The Detroit Pistons ( 31 - 49 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 33 - 47 ) 116 - 77 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 30 - 10 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 51 percent from the field and 57 percent from three - point range , while holding the Hornets to just 34 percent shooting from the floor and 27 percent from beyond the arc . Tobias Harris was the player of the game , as he led the Pistons in scoring with 24 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt ) , along with three steals , in 27 minutes off the bench . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double with 15 points and 19 rebounds , while also recording four assists and two blocks . Greg Monroe finished with 17 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 9 - 10 FT ) , nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , in 33 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Pistons was Jon Leuer , who chipped in 17 points on 6 - 7 shooting , including 5 - 6 from long range , in just 19 minutes . For the Hornets , Gerald Henderson led the way with 14 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and two assists , in 26 minutes . Kemba Walker was the only starter to score more than seven points , with seven points ( 2 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , while Bismack Biyombo ( five points ) and Marvin Williams ( four points , in 19 minutes ) were the only other than that . Marco Belinelli was the high - point guard for Charlotte , with 16 points and 12 rebounds , in 29 minutes . Up next , the Pistons will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Hornets will head to Cleveland to play the Cavaliers on Friday . The Hornets will be right back in action Friday , when they host the Bucks .

James Harden led the way for the Rockets , scoring 20 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and nine assists , in 33 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times , converting on seven of those attempts . Trevor Ariza finished with 16 points , seven rebounds , three assists and five steals , in 31 minutes , while Clint Capela chipped in with 13 points and nine rebounds , along with one assist and one block , in 26 minutes . Coming off the bench , Eric Gordon had a solid game , finishing with 17 points and four assists in 28 minutes . The Nuggets were led by Jamal Murray , who had 24 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) , five rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 29 minutes . Danilo Gallinari had 16 points and five rebounds in 35 minutes . Kenneth Faried finished with 14 points and 11 rebounds , while Will Barton added 17 points , five assists and seven rebounds . Jusuf Nurkic had 10 points and seven boards , in 20 minutes . Up next , the Rockets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Nuggets will go on the road to Portland to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 8 - 22 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 17 - 14 ) 120 - 118 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 31 - 40 in the first quarter , but the Hornets battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Nets were able to out - score the Hornets 37 - 30 in the final period to seal the win . The Hornets were led by Nicolas Batum , who finished with 24 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , five rebounds , five assists and three steals in 37 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 24 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists per game . Kemba Walker was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Hornets , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) , six assists , three rebounds and two steals in 35 minutes . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist recorded a double - double with 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and 10 rebounds , while Cody Zeller added 15 points and nine rebounds in 29 minutes . Coming off the bench , Marco Belinelli chipped in 17 points , four rebounds and one assist in 22 minutes . Sean Kilpatrick led the way for the Nets , scoring 23 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 4 - 7 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and adding five rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes . It was his second strong performance in a row , after scoring 21 points in Monday 's win over the Bulls . Brook Lopez was the Nets ' leading scorer with 21 points and five rebounds in 33 minutes , while also adding five assists , four steals and three blocks . Trevor Booker struggled with his shot , going 1 - for - 3 from the field , but still finished with three points , 12 rebounds and three assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high 12 times , converting on eight of those attempts . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Trevor Booker , who scored three points ( 1 - 3 FG ) , but added 12 rebounds in 22 mintues . The bench was led by Caris LeVert , who had 26 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 8- 9 FT ) in 27 minutes . The two teams will meet again on Friday , as the Hornets will travel to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers , while the Nets will host the Knicks on Friday .

Hickson added 10 points , three rebounds and two assists , in 24 minutes . The Golden State Warriors ( 9 - 2 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 7 - 4 ) 127 - 121 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Warriors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the majority of the game , as the Raptors never led by more than seven points in the first three quarters . Golden State shot 51 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while the Raptors shot 45 percent from beyond the arc and just 40 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Warriors recording 33 assists to just 12 turnovers , while Toronto committed 14 turnovers to just 16 assists . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who scored a game - high 34 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 17 - 17 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 25 points and 8 assists on the season . Kyle Lowry was n't far behind , as he finished with 24 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Jonas Valanciunas and Cory Joseph were the only other Raptors to reach double figures in points , as they scored 12 and 14 points respectively . Kevin Durant led the Warriors with 30 points ( 11 - 21 FG ) , nine rebounds and six assists , while Stephen Curry added 35 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 12 - 13 FT ) and seven assists of his own . It was a season - high in points for Curry , who 's averaging 27 points per game so far this season . Klay Thompson struggled shooting , going 4 - for 15 points ( 3 - 11 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) but still finished with 15 points , four rebounds and one assist in 32 minutes . Draymond Green had 11 points , seven rebounds and five assists in 35 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Warriors was Marreese Speights , who came off the bench to score 10 points and grab five rebounds in 25 minutes . Up next , the Warriors will head home to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while Raptors will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .

The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 29 - 15 in the first quarter , but the Pelicans battled back in the second quarter to make it a one - point game heading into halftime . The Pelicans were able to make a run in the third quarter , cutting the deficit to five points , but Russell Westbrook and the Thunder responded with a 23 - 2 run of their own to put the game out of reach . Westbrook finished with 28 points ( 10 - 23 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) , 17 rebounds and 12 assists in 38 minutes , while Victor Oladipo added 15 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) , five rebounds and four assists in 35 minutes . E'Twaun Moore added 10 points and three assists in 23 minutes . Tyreke Evans was the high - point man for the Pelicans , with 16 points , four rebounds and one assist in 15 minutes . On deck for New Orleans is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday . For the Thunder on Friday , the Thunder will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs .

Meanwhile , the Pacers will look to keep their winning streak alive as they play host to the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .

He 's had a nice start to the season , as he 's averaging 24 points and 10 rebounds in his first three games . In fact , Atlanta led for the entirety of the second half , as they never trailed after the first quarter . Rebounding was a huge factor , with the Hawks winning that battle , 50 - 37 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Atlanta recording 29 assists to just 15 turnovers , while Dallas committed 14 turnovers to just 14 assists . The Mavericks ( 27 - 23 ) had to play this game without Dirk Nowitzki , J.J. Barea and Devin Harris and it clearly hurt them . Chandler Parsons was the only starter in double figures , as he tallied 19 points and 11 rebounds . Deron Williams went scoreless in eight minutes , while Zaza Pachulia totaled just four points and 13 rebounds on 1 - of - 4 shooting . Dwight Powell led the bench with 15 points , four rebounds and three assists . On deck for Dallas is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Dennis Schroder was a nice spark off the bench , providing 14 points and three rebounds . Atlanta 's next game will be on Friday , when they host the Philadelphia 76ers for their next game .

The Heat were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Bulls 34 - 20 to finish the game . They were led by their defense , as they held the Bulls to 46 percent shooting from the field and 48 percent from three - point range , while also forcing them to commit 20 turnovers . They also out - rebounded the Bulls 38 - 29 and forced them into 20 turnovers , while committing only nine of their own . Goran Dragic finished with 17 points and 11 assists , while Dwyane Wade added 18 points and seven assists , in 34 minutes . He went 6 - for - 11 from the floor and 1 - for 1 from the free throw line to score 17 points , while adding three assists . The only other Wizards player to score in double figures was Kelly Oubre , Jr. , who finished with 12 points in 20 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo , while also adding four rebounds , five assists and three steals in 36 minutes . Khris Middleton went just 1 - for 6 points , but did add three rebounds and two steals in 25 minutes . Greg Monroe was the only other Bucks player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 13 points and five rebounds in 21 minutes . Milwaukee shot just 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Next up , the Wizards will head home to take on the Pistons on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 14 - 27 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 26 - 13 ) 121 - 114 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 29 - 21 in the first quarter and 34 - 23 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Bulls were n't able to keep up with the Magic 's 59 percent shooting from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Magic , scoring a game - high 33 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , while also adding two assists and two rebounds in 36 minutes . Nikola Vucevic was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , as he finished with 33 points and 11 rebounds in 38 minutes . The Bulls were led by Pau Gasol , who finished with 28 points and 14 rebounds in 35 minutes . Derrick Rose was the high - point man for the Bulls , with 18 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) , to go along with seven assists , two rebounds and two steals in 30 minutes . Jimmy Butler finished with 17 points ( 5 - 13 FG ) and two assists in 43 minutes , while Nikola Mirotic chipped in with 12 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 7 3 Pt ) and four assists in 24 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Magic will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Bulls will head to Milwaukee to play the Bucks on Friday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 32 - 13 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 29 - 15 ) 103 - 96 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Wizards 20 - 20 in the first quarter and 34 - 15 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into halftime . The Wizards made a run in the third quarter , cutting the lead to six points , but the Trail Blazers responded with a 34 - point fourth quarter to seal the win . LaMarcus Aldridge led all scorers with 26 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 36 minutes . Damian Lillard finished with 20 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) , seven assists and three rebounds , while Wesley Matthews added 19 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 5 - 11 3 Pt ) , three rebounds and three assists , in 35 minutes . The Blazers shot 40 percent from the field and 42 percent from beyond the arc , while the Wizards shot 49 percent ( 33 - 79 ) from the floor . John Wall led the Wizards in scoring with 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) and nine assists , along with four rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes . Paul Pierce finished with 19 points and six rebounds , in 30 minutes , while Nene added 15 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , in 28 minutes . Bradley Beal chipped in 16 points , five rebounds and five assists , while Marcin Gortat had four points and seven rebounds in 31 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . Portland , on the other hand , will look to continue their winning ways on Friday when they play host to the Heat . They 'll look to extend their winning streak to three games , as they 'll be in Miami on Friday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 10 - 40 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 37 - 13 ) 90 - 89 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 24 - 23 in the first quarter , but the Grizzlies battled back in the second quarter to make it a one - point game . However , the Timberwolves were able to out - score the Grizzlies 25 - 20 in the third quarter , giving them enough of a cushion to hold off the Grizzlies in the final period to secure the victory . The Grizzlies were led by Mike Conley , who finished with 15 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , seven assists and four rebounds in 36 minutes . He 's now averaging 15 points and 7 assists on the season . Jeff Green was the only other Memphis player to reach double figures in points , finishing with 15 . He also added three rebounds and two assists in 31 minutes . Marc Gasol added 15 points , three rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block in 32 minutes . Courtney Lee chipped in 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) , one rebound , one assist and two steals in 29 minutes . Zach Randolph struggled with his shot , going 3 - for - 7 from the field to finish with six points , but he did grab 10 rebounds and recorded two steals . Andrew Wiggins led the way for the Timberwolves with 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal in 43 minutes . Ricky Rubio added 17 points , five rebounds and five assists in 26 minutes , while Thaddeus Young added 14 points , eight rebounds , four assists and three steals in 40 minutes . Kevin Martin finished with 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG ) and five rebounds in 38 minutes . Nikola Pekovic had 13 points and three rebounds in 22 minutes before fouling out in the fourth quarter . The Wolves shot just 43 percent from the floor and 29 percent from three - point range , but they were still able to hold the Grizzlies to just 52 percent shooting and 17 percent from long range . Next up , the Grizzlies will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 10 - 10 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 16 - 6 ) 111 - 102 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Pacers were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Clippers 35 - 33 to finish off the game . The Clippers had a chance to tie the game late in the game , but Chris Paul missed a three - pointer at the buzzer that would have sent it to overtime . Paul finished with 18 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , 11 assists and two rebounds in 35 minutes . Paul 's backcourt partner in the backcourt , J.J. Redick , also had a strong showing . He finished with 15 points and three rebounds in 31 minutes . Blake Griffin led the way for the Clippers , finishing with 24 points and 16 rebounds in 34 minutes . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with nine points ( 3 - 3 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 15 rebounds , while Jamal Crawford chipped in 14 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) in 27 minutes off the bench . Paul George and Thaddeus Young led the Pacers in scoring with 16 points each . Young added seven rebounds and two assists , while George had seven rebounds , five assists and three steals . Monta Ellis and Jeff Teague were the only other Pacers to score in double figures with 14 and 15 points , respectively . Rodney Stuckey was the high - point man for the Pacers , as he finished with 12 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 3PT , 4 - 7 - 2 FT ) in 15 minutes . With the win , the Pacers improved to 9 - 10 - 9 on the road and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division . They 're home against the Golden State Warriors on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Clippers are off until Friday night , when they take on the Portland Trail Blazers at Staples Center .
The Washington Wizards ( 6 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 7 - 6 ) 97 - 95 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 30 - 24 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Pistons never led by more than seven points in the second half . Otto Porter led the way for the Wizards , scoring 17 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting from the field . He also added five rebounds , two steals and one assist in 31 minutes . Marcin Gortat added 14 points and eight rebounds of his own , while Otto Porter , Jr. finished with 18 points and seven rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench . John Wall struggled shooting the ball , going 4 - for - 11 from the floor , but still finished with eight points , seven assists , two rebounds and two steals in 27 minutes . Bradley Beal and Kris Humphries combined for just nine points , but the Wizards were still able to out - rebound the Pistons 42 - 38 . The Pistons were led by Reggie Jackson , who scored 20 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with nine assists , three rebounds and one steal in 32 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova was the only other starter in double figures , scoring 18 points on 7 - 10 shooting and grabbing five rebounds in 33 minutes . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished with 16 points and one rebound , while Marcus Morris added 18 points , nine rebounds and four assists in 37 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double , scoring eight points ( 3 - 6 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and grabbing 13 rebounds in 36 minutes . The only other Piston to reach double figures in points was Tobias Harris , who chipped in 18 points ( 9 - 10 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) in 22 minuets off of the bench , while also adding seven rebounds and three blocked shots . Washington 's next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Utah Jazz , 85 - 84 , at TD Garden on Wednesday . The Jazz ( 24 - 36 ) came into Wednesday 's contest as a double - digit favorite , having won four of their last five games . However , they were outscored by a 59 - 48 margin over the final three quarters , allowing the Celtics to pull away late in the fourth quarter and steal a victory . The Celtics were led by a 21 - point , seven - assist double - double from Kelly Olynyk , who also had three rebounds and seven assists , in 26 minutes off the bench . Jae Crowder followed up with 18 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block in 33 minutes , while Avery Bradley chipped in 13 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Marcus Smart and Evan Turner combined for just nine points on 3 - of - 14 shooting from the field , while Tyler Zeller added eight points , 11 rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal in 30 minutes . Gordon Hayward and Derrick Favors led the way for the Jazz with matching 13 - point tallies , while Rudy Gobert added 10 points , 16 rebounds , three assists , one steal and three blocks in 36 minutes . Alec Burks led the bench with 16 points , eight assists and six rebounds , in 32 minutes . Next up , the Jazz visit the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Celtics visit the Toronto Raptors on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 49 - 23 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 26 - 46 ) 115 - 91 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 37 - 15 in the first quarter and 37 - 25 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , as they shot 53 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range , while the Pelicans shot just 44 percent from beyond the arc and 27 percent from long range . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and five assists , in 30 minutes . He 's now averaging 23 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists on the season . Norman Powell was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Raptors , as he finished with 15 points and seven rebounds , in 34 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas finished with 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and nine rebounds , while Kyle Lowry chipped in 11 points ( 3 - 13 FG , 0 - 8 3PT , 5 - 7 FT ) and eight assists in 28 minutes . Terrence Ross came off the bench to score 16 points , while adding five rebounds , three assists and two blocked shots , in 20 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Alonzo Gee , who finished with 18 points ( 8 - 12 FG ) , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 41 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , after scoring 18 points and grabbing eight rebounds in Monday 's game against the Mavericks . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Toney Douglas , who had 11 points and two assists in 22 minutes . Ryan Anderson Varejao was the high - point man for the Pelicans , with 14 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , along with four rebounds , five assists and four steals , in 27 minutes . Alexis Ajinca started in place of Anthony Davis , who sat out with an illness , and finished with nine points , four rebounds and one assist , in 21 minutes . New Orleans will look to get out of this slide on Friday in a home matchup against the Kings . The Toronto Raptors ' next game will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while New Orleans , who 's on a two - game losing streak , will travel to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Friday .
The New York Knicks defeated the Detroit Pistons 105 - 102 at Madison Square Garden on Friday . The Knicks ( 5 - 6 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they led for the final 40 - plus minutes . Defense was key , as the Knicks held the Pistons to 49 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . New York also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle 52 - 40 and outscoring Detroit in the paint 52 - 39 . The Pistons ( 6 - 5 ) have now lost four of their last five games , as this was a tough task against a hungry Knicks team . Tobias Harris was the only starter in double figures , as he tallied 19 points and 10 rebounds in the defeat . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the team in scoring , dropping 21 points on 9 - of - 22 shooting . Ish Smith provided 14 points and eight assists , while Andre Drummond finished with 15 points and nine rebounds . Jon Leuer led the bench with 17 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Kristaps Porzingis was the player of the game , accumulating 35 points , seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Carmelo Anthony finished second on the team with 22 points and five rebounds . Derrick Rose and Joakim Noah combined for 22 points , eight rebounds , four assists , three blocks and one steal . The only other player to score in double digits for the Knicks was Willy Hernangomez , who dropped nine points in 24 minutes off the bench . Up next for New York is a matchup against the Chicago Bulls on Sunday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 5 - 19 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 13 ) 95 - 90 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 23 - 24 in the first quarter , but the Kings battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Pistons were able to out - score the Kings 28 - 14 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Josh Smith led the Pistons in scoring with 21 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds , six assists , five blocks and two steals , in 38 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double with 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and 10 rebounds , along with two steals and one block , in 26 minutes . Jon Leuer was huge off the bench for the Pistons , as he finished with 24 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 8 - 9 FT ) and eight rebounds , in 32 minutes . The Kings were led by Rudy Gay , who finished with 20 points , eight rebounds and eight assists , in 36 minutes , while Ben McLemore added 14 points , six rebounds and one assist , in 31 minutes . Darren Collison struggled shooting , going 1 - for - 10 from the field , but still finished with three points , seven assists , three rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 33 minutes . Ty Lawson chipped in 15 points and 11 rebounds , while playing 24 minutes , in just his second game of the season . Up next , the Kings will look to get back on track against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , while the Pistons will head home to take on the Houston Rockets on Friday .
